WHAT TO EXPECT IN THIS DAILY DIARY

A photo journal for memories üìù
You can write your thoughts, feelings or experiences and attach photos. Even little notes each day help to organize your inner thoughts and gain clarity on your priorities.
It can also be used as a gratitude diary to remind yourself of the good things that have happened during the day.

A mood tracker
Track emotions and note your feelings every day to see what makes you happy or sad. Emotion tracker is a very important tool that contributes to understanding yourself better. All your notes are locked, so nobody except you can access them.

Planning
Use the calendar and daily reminders not to forget anything important. Planning is key to have everything done on time. Record your classes, appointments or other events on the calendar.

Security üîí
Use fingerprint or face-ID to keep your personal notes private. Or set a password to be sure that your diary is protected.

And for sure new features are coming soon!

title: Simple Mood Tracker & Diary
description:
Mood Month is the simple but effective mood tracking app and diary. Track your daily moods with different emotions and keep a record of how your mood is changing throughout the months. You can also write down your thoughts each day and keep a diary of how you are feeling, what's making you happy or what's making you sad.

Mood Month keeps track of what's important by checking how you feel each day and allows you to keep a diary so you can write down anything that is important to tracking your mood. Keep this app on your phone and remember to track your mood daily. Mood Month keeps it simple by letting you track your mood with 5 options and if there is anything you need to add, you can use the diary notes to track your day. This way tracking your mood every single day is as less time consuming as it can be.

Check your progress throughout the months with the personalised mood tracking section that shows your mood statistics. Also see your mood tracked across a graph to get a better understanding of any patterns or warnings.

Tracking your mood and keeping a diary is a private and personal activity. Mood Month lets you lock the app so only you can access it with your personal pin or fingerprint.

If you're looking for just a simple diary, then this app can be just that but Mood Month will also encourage you to simply and through the click of one button link a mood with your diary entry so you can start the beneficial process of tracking your mood.

Features of Mood Month - Mood Tracker & Diary:
- Easily track your moods with 5 simple but varying mood options
- Keep a diary of your days along with your moods
- Check your progress and see how your mood is changing in several ways including a graph
- Lock your personal mood tracking information with a pin
- Quick and productive: Daily tracking is not time consuming

title: Mudy: Mood Tracker Journal
description:
Daily mood tracker helps track your emotions and feelings in a beautiful and colorful way. Fill the month with your emotions and leave a note for it! Fill out your feelings journal and track your happiness with a calendar full of your memories in an interactive way.

A mood diary helps to boost our quality of life, by carefully observing what we do every day and capturing what emotions we feel next to what activities, places, times, and people. All data from the mood journal help to find patterns that lead to improved quality of life and emotional stability.

A mood tracker journal is an amazing tool to check and record your emotions, feelings, and health. Just choose the emotion that you feeling now and describe it, so in the future, you always can back to it and recheck the reasons.

Happiness tracker
Track situations that come in your life and how they affect your happiness. Choose Mudy that most clearly reflects your psychological state at the moment and note the reasons for emotion. And with the help of the happiness tracker, you can find what annoys you the most and what gives you joy.

Mood calendar
Since ancient times, calendars have helped people navigate the days, months, and years. But why not fill the calendar not just with numbers, but with your emotions? By creating a real personal mood calendar filled with private emotions, feelings, and experiences.

Mood notes
An accurately composed note helps to remember an event that happened in life or not to forget an important situation. When writing mood notes, be sure to mention what or who led you to these emotions so that in the future there will be a way to track the causes and patterns of their occurrence.

Mind journal
Get to know yourself and your character with a mood diary. Track how you react to situations in your life by filling out your personal mind journal. This will help you to know yourself better and understand how your inner self thinks and what it wants.

Emotions tracker
Mudy allows you to select an emotion or several emotions for each day of the month and display it in the form of a calendar. Such activity, simple at first glance, allows you to track your psychological state with the help of an emotion tracker and learn even more about yourself.

Mudy - is your personal mood calendar and feelings journal. It helps to understand yourself and your reaction to the world around you. Find how the week or month is going for you and what emotions you feel. A simple tool that may help improve quality of life.

title: EMMO
description:
EMMO is a place where you can record your mood anytime, anywhere, whether you are happy or sad or sour or sweet.
This is a small tree hole, listen to all your beauty and troubles.
This is a small world that belongs only to you, where you can express your emotions with self-made facial expressions.
The EMMO diary allows people to write diaries in a different way.
Travel in your own small world with self-made emoji + text. Come and record your life with EMMO diary.

title: Symptom & Mood Tracker
description: ‚úÖ All your health tracking in one place Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your mood, symptoms, sleep, exercise, diet, and medication? We think all of this should be kept in one convenient place so that you and your doctors can get the full picture of your health. ‚úÖ Reclaim control over your Symptoms & Mood Bearable empowers people to reclaim control over their well-being by making mood and symptom tracking simple, convenient, and accessible. Making entries in our health diary is quick and effortless, so you can focus more energy on feeling better. The app has been shaped by our community of thousands of people with varying chronic health issues. ‚úÖ Gain insights with just a few clicks a day Discover trends and correlations in your habits, symptoms, mood, and more. With just a few clicks each day our intelligent health diary can help you to gain insights into which daily activities and health factors are positively and negatively affecting your mental and physical health. Bearable helps you to: ‚úîÔ∏è Record your mood and symptoms in seconds quickly journal changes in emotions, mental health, and the severity of your symptoms such as pain, fatigue, and symptoms of acute and chronic illness. ‚úîÔ∏è Gain insights into how your daily activities correlate with changes in your mood, symptoms, sleep, and energy. ‚úîÔ∏è Keep everything in one place with our health timeline. Filter your entries to make them even easier to share with your doctor or therapist. ‚úîÔ∏è Fully customise how you journal your daily habits and health factors, such as sleep, diet, exercise, medication, stress, anxiety, emotions and symptoms of acute and chronic illness. ‚úîÔ∏è Come prepared to your next doctor or therapist appointment with a detailed timeline, a complete diary of changes in your well-being, and insights into potential triggers and treatments. ‚úîÔ∏è Make journaling a healthy habit with our quick and enjoyable entry process. And there‚Äôs much more‚Ä¶ ‚ûï Set Reminders. Customise your reminders for healthy habits, medication, mental health check-ins, and more ‚ûï Share and Export. Export your data privately and securely. ‚ûï Sync health data automatically. Such as Sleep, Steps, and Heart Rate from GoogleFit ‚ûï Dark mode. ‚ûï Restore data across devices. üí° Just some of the ways people use Bearable Symptom tracker Mood tracker & journal Emotion tracker Mental health Tracker Anxiety tracker Pain tracker Chronic Illness tracker Medication tracker Health journal & diary üîê PRIVATE & SECURE Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can delete it from within the app at any time. It‚Äôs important to emphasise that we will never under any circumstances sell any personal data to anyone. üíü MADE BY PEOPLE WHO UNDERSTAND AND CARE Created by individuals who have lived with health issues themselves. With feedback and feature requests from a research group of thousands of people with a wide variety of chronic diseases and both mental and physical health conditions, including Anxiety, Depression, CFS (ME), MS (Multiple Sclerosis), Fibromyalgia, Endometriosis, Bipolar, BPD, PTSD, Migraines, Headaches, Vertigo, Cancer (Chemo Symptoms), Arthritis, Crohns, Diabetes, IBS and IBD. Our aim is to make our symptom tracker simple and accessible to everyone, even if suffering from the fatigue and brain fog that often accompanies many conditions. We have created a real sense of community around Bearable and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most. We are committed to improving this app to help as many people to reclaim control over their health as possible. If you have any questions, feedback or feature requests, please send them to james@bearable.app. We‚Äôd love to hear from you. Credit to Freepik for icons
descriptionHTML:
‚úÖ All your health tracking in one place

Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your mood, symptoms, sleep, exercise, diet, and medication? We think all of this should be kept in one convenient place so that you and your doctors can get the full picture of your health.

‚úÖ Reclaim control over your Symptoms & Mood

Bearable empowers people to reclaim control over their well-being by making mood and symptom tracking simple, convenient, and accessible. Making entries in our health diary is quick and effortless, so you can focus more energy on feeling better.

The app has been shaped by our community of thousands of people with varying chronic health issues.

‚úÖ Gain insights with just a few clicks a day

Discover trends and correlations in your habits, symptoms, mood, and more.

With just a few clicks each day our intelligent health diary can help you to gain insights into which daily activities and health factors are positively and negatively affecting your mental and physical health.


Bearable helps you to:

‚úîÔ∏è Record your mood and symptoms in seconds quickly journal changes in emotions, mental health, and the severity of your symptoms such as pain, fatigue, and symptoms of acute and chronic illness.


‚úîÔ∏è Gain insights into how your daily activities correlate with changes in your mood, symptoms, sleep, and energy.


‚úîÔ∏è Keep everything in one place with our health timeline. Filter your entries to make them even easier to share with your doctor or therapist.


‚úîÔ∏è Fully customise how you journal your daily habits and health factors, such as sleep, diet, exercise, medication, stress, anxiety, emotions and symptoms of acute and chronic illness.


‚úîÔ∏è Come prepared to your next doctor or therapist appointment with a detailed timeline, a complete diary of changes in your well-being, and insights into potential triggers and treatments.


‚úîÔ∏è Make journaling a healthy habit with our quick and enjoyable entry process.


And there‚Äôs much more‚Ä¶


‚ûï Set Reminders. Customise your reminders for healthy habits, medication, mental health check-ins, and more

‚ûï Share and Export. Export your data privately and securely.

‚ûï Sync health data automatically. Such as Sleep, Steps, and Heart Rate from GoogleFit

‚ûï Dark mode.

‚ûï Restore data across devices.


üí° Just some of the ways people use Bearable

Symptom tracker
Mood tracker & journal
Emotion tracker
Mental health Tracker
Anxiety tracker
Pain tracker
Chronic Illness tracker
Medication tracker
Health journal & diary


üîê PRIVATE & SECURE

Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can delete it from within the app at any time. It‚Äôs important to emphasise that we will never under any circumstances sell any personal data to anyone.


üíü MADE BY PEOPLE WHO UNDERSTAND AND CARE

Created by individuals who have lived with health issues themselves. With feedback and feature requests from a research group of thousands of people with a wide variety of chronic diseases and both mental and physical health conditions, including Anxiety, Depression, CFS (ME), MS (Multiple Sclerosis), Fibromyalgia, Endometriosis, Bipolar, BPD, PTSD, Migraines, Headaches, Vertigo, Cancer (Chemo Symptoms), Arthritis, Crohns, Diabetes, IBS and IBD.

Our aim is to make our symptom tracker simple and accessible to everyone, even if suffering from the fatigue and brain fog that often accompanies many conditions.

We have created a real sense of community around Bearable and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most. We are committed to improving this app to help as many people to reclaim control over their health as possible. If you have any questions, feedback or feature requests, please send them to james@bearable.app. We‚Äôd love to hear from you.

title: Journey: Diary, Journal
description: Join millions of Journey users and create a healthier, happier mind. A sanctuary for your mind and soul, Journey will help increase your positive energy, be more grateful and a calmer mind by building healthy thinkings through journaling. We‚Äôre more than just a journal, or a diary; we‚Äôre your own motivational coach and happiness trainer. Let's embark on a fabulous journey of self-improvement today. Top Reasons You Need Journey: ‚ÅÉ Want to find a place to keep daily reflections privately ‚ÅÉ Want to pour your feelings/brain dump ‚ÅÉ Want to keep a affirmation and gratitude list ‚ÅÉ Struggle to maintain a journaling routine ‚ÅÉ Want to get out of depression ‚ÅÉ Have anxiety and cannot calm the thoughts in your mind ‚ÅÉ Track the achievements you've made in life Journey Benefits: ‚ÅÉ Focus and Concentration ‚ÅÉ Better Sleep ‚ÅÉ Managing Stress ‚ÅÉ Calming Anxieties and Meditation ‚ÅÉ Happiness ‚ÅÉ Healthier Mind ‚ÅÉ Better Habits ‚ÅÉ Motivation Integrated Coaching: Ready for a healthier mind? Take your life to a new level by using our integrated journaling prompts by Journey coach: ‚ÅÉ Inspire Me "One good quote is worth a book". Receive daily inspirational quotes by famous people. Think and write how the idea applies to your life. ‚ÅÉ Gratitude 365 "Whether you appreciated and give thanks for will increase in your life". Write 3 things you are grateful based on a topic of the day. ‚ÅÉ Love & relationship Reflect on your romantic relationship and identify habits that you need to build, problems that you need to fix, and the issues that you need to prevent in your relationship. And More... Journey Features: ‚ÅÉ Sync to cloud via Google Drive ‚ÅÉ Passcode and fingerprint protected ‚ÅÉ Available on mobile, desktop and web ‚ÅÉ Integrate Journey coach: a daily/weekly journaling prompt ‚ÅÉ Beginners step-by-step guide to journaling ‚ÅÉ View entries in timeline, calendar, map ‚ÅÉ Advanced search: Activity, mood, favorites ‚ÅÉ Compose entries via email ‚ÅÉ Link to Zapier - View your journals on Wear OS To learn about Journey, please visit this page: https://journey.cloud.
descriptionHTML:
Join millions of Journey users and create a healthier, happier mind. A sanctuary for your mind and soul, Journey will help increase your positive energy, be more grateful and a calmer mind by building healthy thinkings through journaling.

We‚Äôre more than just a journal, or a diary; we‚Äôre your own motivational coach and happiness trainer. Let's embark on a fabulous journey of self-improvement today.

Top Reasons You Need Journey:

‚ÅÉ Want to find a place to keep daily reflections privately
‚ÅÉ Want to pour your feelings/brain dump
‚ÅÉ Want to keep a affirmation and gratitude list
‚ÅÉ Struggle to maintain a journaling routine
‚ÅÉ Want to get out of depression
‚ÅÉ Have anxiety and cannot calm the thoughts in your mind
‚ÅÉ Track the achievements you've made in life

Journey Benefits:

‚ÅÉ Focus and Concentration
‚ÅÉ Better Sleep
‚ÅÉ Managing Stress
‚ÅÉ Calming Anxieties and Meditation
‚ÅÉ Happiness
‚ÅÉ Healthier Mind
‚ÅÉ Better Habits
‚ÅÉ Motivation

Integrated Coaching:

Ready for a healthier mind? Take your life to a new level by using our integrated journaling prompts by Journey coach:

‚ÅÉ Inspire Me
"One good quote is worth a book". Receive daily inspirational quotes by famous people. Think and write how the idea applies to your life.

‚ÅÉ Gratitude 365
"Whether you appreciated and give thanks for will increase in your life". Write 3 things you are grateful based on a topic of the day.

‚ÅÉ Love & relationship
Reflect on your romantic relationship and identify habits that you need to build, problems that you need to fix, and the issues that you need to prevent in your relationship.

And More...

Journey Features:

‚ÅÉ Sync to cloud via Google Drive
‚ÅÉ Passcode and fingerprint protected
‚ÅÉ Available on mobile, desktop and web
‚ÅÉ Integrate Journey coach: a daily/weekly journaling prompt
‚ÅÉ Beginners step-by-step guide to journaling
‚ÅÉ View entries in timeline, calendar, map
‚ÅÉ Advanced search: Activity, mood, favorites
‚ÅÉ Compose entries via email
‚ÅÉ Link to Zapier
- View your journals on Wear OS


To learn about Journey, please visit this page:
https://journey.cloud.

title: Mood Tracker Journal -MoodJour
description:
What makes MoodJour a unique Mood Tracker and Journal Bullet?
1. Private and 100% safe mood tracker
2. Access offline just like a diary journal with lock. Needs no login.
3. Add unlimited moods and self care activity to mood tracker
4. Add people to your mood journal and correlate your mental health
5. Track self-improvement with graphs and charts of your mood-tracker
6. Analyse the correlation of activities to your mood and mental health
7. Backup your diary journal to your private Google drive and restore on any phone
8. Track streaks of journaling and mood tracking 
9. Lock your secret journal diary with password

Moodjour is your self care app and can be used daily as Mood Tracker, Journal, Diary with lock and Activity tracker app. 

MoodJour is your mental health tracker that brings anxiety relief and control over emotions. 
Using mood-tracker daily takes you on a journey of self-care and self-improvement.
Track mood, log daily activities, tag people, and add notes to preserve your life journey in daily journal bullet format.
Mood jour can help you attain good mental health by being your Mood Tracker, Emotion tracker, Self-harm tracker, Relationship Tracker. 

MoodJour is also a powerful journal bullet. You can add notes and images to any mood entry and that transforms app into a secret diary journal, gratitude journal, or mood journal.

Mood jour can be your self care companion in many forms:-
1. Mood Tracker: Track 5 parent moods and unlimited emotions in your mood diary log. Daily emotion tracker helps you overcome negativity on your path of self love journey. Choose from many emoticons and different mood color scheme. Good mood tracking and bad mood journaling are equally easy in free mood tracker.
2. Journal Bullet: Create your daily journal diary with notes and images. MoodJour captures yours self-care journey in a beautiful timeline view grouped by mood from day one.
3. Mental Health Tracker: Track activities and people impact on your mental health, emotions and moods. Analysis of your mood-tracker and journal helps you in anxiety relief. MoodJour helps in managing depression, adhd, bipolar moods with its self care tracker from day one.
4. Self Harm Tracker: By showing correlation between related activity, people and mood, you can stay away from self-harm triggers. Mood tracker can easily transform into your symptom tracker diary by creating custom activity and moods. You journey of self-improvement begins now.
5. Gratitude Journal: Gratitude and self love brings positivity in life. Journaling about gratitude and self care helps you fight stress, anxiety and negativity from day one with Mood-Tracker.
6. Private Diary: Mood jour is a completely private journal with lock and mood tracker. All your data stays on your phone. Self care and journaling doesn't get safer than this.
7. Self Care app: Self love is very important for good mental health. Analyse your activities and people in your life to realise what make you happy and sad. Follow your journey of self-improvement on self care tracker.

Free tier of MoodJour Mood Tracker app allows to track unlimited moods and journal notes for free. Users can join MoodJour pro by paying monthly or yearly subscription.

MoodJour Pro members enjoy additional benefits of:-
1. Add more than 3 activities to a mood entry of mood tracker
2. Unlock all analysis and graphs for correlation between mood, activity and people
3. Unlock premium activity icons, emoticons and colors
4. Backup mood tracker and all your diary journal to Google Drive

Privacy policy: https://habityou.com/privacy-policy/
Terms & Conditions: https://habityou.com/terms-of-service/

Mail us on contact@habityou.com

title: Prompted Journal
description:
A daily journal for self-compassion.

Be your own best friend, cheerleader, spiritual guru, etc. with our carefully crafted daily journal prompts. It‚Äôs an easy way to incorporate self reflection into your life, and reflect on all the things that matter. 

Your diary is not just about writing what you ate for lunch. Instead, you can befriend yourself with thought-provoking prompts from day one. Reflect on your hopes and dreams, and really listen to yourself like a compassionate friend. If you‚Äôve ever struggled to keep up with a diary, our daily journal prompts can remove the struggle of thinking of things to say, and make this journaling habit easy to maintain.

Each journal prompt comes with ‚ÄúDive Deeper‚Äù questions to help you get the most out of your self care journal:
E.g. For the writing prompt: ‚ÄúLove is‚Ä¶‚Äù, reflect on Dive Deeper questions like ‚ÄúHow do you show love towards others? How do others show love towards you? What was your first memory of feeling loved? Does love have a spiritual dimension for you? If so, how?‚Äù 
The Dive Deeper questions help prevent writer‚Äôs block, making journaling a powerful wellness tool from day one.

A daily diary can seem daunting, even tedious ‚Äî when in fact, journaling can be a powerful self care habit. Read through our reviews: you‚Äôll find users who have used this app as a therapy journal, a self help aid, and a thought diary of everything important to them. Your daily journal can be a deeply rewarding wellness ritual that helps you write thoughts you might have otherwise ignored. We hope Prompted Journal helps you uncover more of what you‚Äôre meant be. 

This writing app can feel like traveling through time. On day one, you‚Äôll write a letter to your future self (1st prompt: Dear Future Me). About 3-4 months later, when the prompt recycles, you‚Äôll be able to read your letter. While we love the physical diary, writing apps make it possible to instantly find the last time you answered the same journal prompt, or view ALL the times you answered the prompt at once. Watch your self esteem improve with each new cycle: your answers to journal prompts like ‚ÄúMy biggest fear‚Ä¶‚Äù might show how you have overcome anxiety. This writing app becomes a conversation between you, your past self, and your future self. Your diary becomes a memento of how much you‚Äôve grown. Just by incorporating a simple 5 minute journal habit into your life, you can get to know yourself again.

WHAT YOU GET:
* Self care journaling for busy lives: 190+ journal prompts ready to go, recurring every 3-4 months.
* Daily reminders help you write and reflect every day.
* Create a PDF of your diary to print, email, or save.
* Daily journaling made easy.

Life is a journey, and our prompts are designed to help you reflect daily on where you‚Äôre heading. Write your thoughts on everything from mental health to love to self esteem. Make the five minute journal session you can squeeze into your mornings equate to five hours of talking with your best friend. Also, customize your guided journal by making journal prompts that only you can: e.g. ‚ÄúMy dog Lucy and I‚Ä¶‚Äù With a wide range of topics you can reflect on, you can see yourself in from various angles. 

OUR MISSION:
Self help and self therapy are difficult because all the incredible books and spot-on teachings don‚Äôt force you to put them into practice. ‚ÄúLove yourself,‚Äù ‚ÄúBe grateful,‚Äù etc. sound simple, but can be surprisingly hard to do. We hope our writing apps turn apparently ‚Äúsimple‚Äù self help mantras like ‚ÄúLove yourself‚Äù into wellness habits you can practice daily.

* We specialize in writing apps that foster self care and wellness. Please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us.

WE RESPECT YOUR PRIVACY:
Your daily journal is yours and yours alone. We don‚Äôt store any of your data or ask you to create an account. We built this diary journal with your privacy in mind. 

Privacy Policy: https://darlingapps.com/our-apps-privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://darlingapps.com/terms-of-service

title: Diary journal and mood tracker
description:
We have collected the most interesting features from all diaries and put it into one best diary!

Secret ideas, thoughts and moments should always remain secret and a private diary should always be intimate, beautiful and safe.

Easy & simple Diary that you can use for quick note taking, for writing a journal, or as a private notebook.

Diary, journal and mood tracker - Serenity gives powerful search functions is available to help you find diary entries by any keyword in the title or text/notes and filter results by date, tags. Preserve your special memories, store personal moments & memories or keep track of your life with help of this app.

Diary, journal and mood tracker - Serenity App Feature:
- Keep your all moments, notes and ideas saved with you
- Add photos from your gallery or add a mood emoji to each entry and express your emotions easily!
- Lock & Protect your personal/private diary entries with a PIN code
- Attach & store unlimited amount of photos in your diary
- Personalize UI with different UI colors & Themes
- Powerful search and filter functions (Dates, Tags, Categories & title/notes)
- Easy to save & share your moments
- Use this diary app to make your own personal journal of daily events, appointments, secrets and feelings.
- Select your journey images to keep all-time with you
- Protect your Diary data with Passcodes

title: DailyBean: Simplest Journal
description: DailyBean is a simple diary app for those who want to record their daily lives easily. Record your day with just a few tabs! DailyBean provides these functions. ‚óã Monthly calendar that gives you a glimpse of your mood flow Take a look at how you feel during a month with five mood beans. If you click on the bean, you can check the record you left that day right away. ‚óã Tap the mood beans and activity icons for a simple record Let's choose your mood for the day and summarize the day with colorful icons. You can add a picture and a line of notes. ‚óã Category blocks that allow you to select only the categories you want Blocks can be added or deleted whenever you want, and categories will be updated continuously. ‚óã Statistics that analyze mood and activity on a weekly/monthly basis Look at your mood flow through statistics and see what activities affect your mood. You can also check the number of icon records on a weekly and monthly basis. If you have any questions or inconveniences while using the app, please contact us here! Mail: harukong@bluesignum.com Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/harukong_official/

‚óã Monthly calendar that gives you a glimpse of your mood flow

Take a look at how you feel during a month with five mood beans. If you click on the bean, you can check the record you left that day right away.

‚óã Tap the mood beans and activity icons for a simple record

Let's choose your mood for the day and summarize the day with colorful icons. You can add a picture and a line of notes.

title: Planety - Mood Journal & Diary
description:
Keeping a diary is really hard!
That's why Planety was born!

Shall we write it together?

‚ñ† First, choose the emotion that represents today
‚ñ† Choose a sticker that explains why you chose that feeling
‚ñ† Lastly, if you write simply, it's over.

Only one minute is required!
You can record your precious day happily and quickly!



‚Äª Permission

[Required Permission]
- Storage: Required for transfer and storage of data, photos, videos and other files

[Selective Permission]
- Camera: Required for taking pictures
- Photo: Required for attaching photos and video files
- Microphone: Required for recording voice

* You can use the app even if you do not allow Selective Permission.

title: My Stress Diary - Mood, Antist
description: My Stress Diary is a self-care tool for improving your mental health confirmed by psychological and scientific research. My Stress Diary app is a simple personalized tracker of mood, productivity and antistress habits. The app has a stress resistance test. You'll reduce anxiety and bad mood, increase stress resistance, mindfulness and mental health with the help of scientific advice. ‚ö´ My Stress Journal app is free and there are no ads ‚ö´ You can use My Stress Journal app without registration and the internet ‚ö´ All your records are stored only on your device and we don`t have access to them MYSTRESS DIARY HELP YOU: Increase your stress resistance Your stress resistance depend on your lifestyle and habits. Stress resistance test will define it. After taking the test, you will get individual recommendations for increasing your stress resistance and mental health! You will be able to track your stress resistance changes in the statistics of journal! Reduce your daily stress You can quickly reduce your anxiety, depression and improve your mood and mental health, describing in detail the stressful event and the emotions. If there is no time, the diary can be quickly completed by selecting the necessary values and icons. You can edit and add details in your journal at any time. Identify the main stress reasons Regular journaling and recording stressful events help you identify the main reasons of anxiety, depression and other mental health problems. You will be able to develop strategies to overcome high level of stress and track your progress in your journal! Maintain high productivity and motivation You will be able to achieve and maintain high productivity and motivation with the help of scientifically proven antistress habits. Get recommendations You can always get recommendations to improve your mental health or change the particular stress level. Recommendations are written in a simple language and you can quickly start to control your daily stress level by yourself. Track your progress in detailed statistics in your journal Share your mood on social media Stress and anxiety are everywhere: traffic jams, deadlines, family conflicts and unpleasant news. Nowadays people are not active, spend a lot of time on-line, so stressful situations have a huge negative influence on our health. We hope that My Stress Diary app will help you control anxiety and improve your mental health, become more mindfulness, productive and satisfied with yourself and the world around you! Reakk Software team PRIVACY POLICY We believe in transparency and honesty. We hope you will find this privacy policy clear and transparent. Do not hesitate to reach out to us at mystressdiary@gmail.com if you have any questions. We do not store, nor have access to your entries and data. Your data are stored only locally on your device and all calculations are done on your device as well. Your backups are stored in your device and we don‚Äôt have access to your backup files. Also any other third-party app can`t read our data. We use the Firebase service (Google Inc.) to monitor and analyze the use of our services. The app collects some usage data that are essential for us to deliver our services, to understand your needs, and to improve our services. Such as app launches, taps, clicks, scrolling information, in-app purchases, screen visits, session durations, or other information about how you interact with our app. These data are anonymized and aggregated from all users who gave us collection consent. The application also collects crashes and performance reports so we can improve the stability and performance of our app. The application does NOT collect any user-generated content. Such as your stress level, mood, event description or anything you type within the app. You can only use our apps if you agree to our Privacy Policy. Otherwise, we ask you not to use our apps.
descriptionHTML:
My Stress Diary is a self-care tool for improving your mental health confirmed by psychological and scientific research. My Stress Diary app is a simple personalized tracker of mood, productivity and antistress habits. The app has a stress resistance test. You'll reduce anxiety and bad mood, increase stress resistance, mindfulness and mental health with the help of scientific advice.


‚ö´ My Stress Journal app is free and there are no ads
‚ö´ You can use My Stress Journal app without registration and the internet
‚ö´ All your records are stored only on your device and we don`t have access to them


MYSTRESS DIARY HELP YOU:

Increase your stress resistance
Your stress resistance depend on your lifestyle and habits. Stress resistance test will define it. After taking the test, you will get individual recommendations for increasing your stress resistance and mental health! You will be able to track your stress resistance changes in the statistics of journal!

Reduce your daily stress
You can quickly reduce your anxiety, depression and improve your mood and mental health, describing in detail the stressful event and the emotions. If there is no time, the diary can be quickly completed by selecting the necessary values and icons. You can edit and add details in your journal at any time.

Identify the main stress reasons
Regular journaling and recording stressful events help you identify the main reasons of anxiety, depression and other mental health problems. You will be able to develop strategies to overcome high level of stress and track your progress in your journal!

Maintain high productivity and motivation
You will be able to achieve and maintain high productivity and motivation with the help of scientifically proven antistress habits.

Get recommendations
You can always get recommendations to improve your mental health or change the particular stress level. Recommendations are written in a simple language and you can quickly start to control your daily stress level by yourself.

Track your progress in detailed statistics in your journal

Share your mood on social media

Stress and anxiety are everywhere: traffic jams, deadlines, family conflicts and unpleasant news. Nowadays people are not active, spend a lot of time on-line, so stressful situations have a huge negative influence on our health. We hope that My Stress Diary app will help you control anxiety and improve your mental health, become more mindfulness, productive and satisfied with yourself and the world around you!

Reakk Software team


PRIVACY POLICY

We believe in transparency and honesty. We hope you will find this privacy policy clear and transparent. Do not hesitate to reach out to us at mystressdiary@gmail.com if you have any questions.

We do not store, nor have access to your entries and data. Your data are stored only locally on your device and all calculations are done on your device as well. Your backups are stored in your device and we don‚Äôt have access to your backup files. Also any other third-party app can`t read our data.

We use the Firebase service (Google Inc.) to monitor and analyze the use of our services. The app collects some usage data that are essential for us to deliver our services, to understand your needs, and to improve our services. Such as app launches, taps, clicks, scrolling information, in-app purchases, screen visits, session durations, or other information about how you interact with our app. These data are anonymized and aggregated from all users who gave us collection consent. The application also collects crashes and performance reports so we can improve the stability and performance of our app.

The application does NOT collect any user-generated content. Such as your stress level, mood, event description or anything you type within the app.

You can only use our apps if you agree to our Privacy Policy. Otherwise, we ask you not to use our apps.

title: Daybook - Diary, Journal, Note
description: Daybook is a FREE, passcode-protected personal diary, journal and notes app available for Android. Daybook helps to record activities, experiences, thoughts, and ideas throughout a day. It lets you organize your created diary/journal entries or notes from the past in the easiest way. WHY USE DAYBOOK? ‚Ä¢ SAFEGUARD MEMORIES: Daybook enables you to write a private diary, memoir, journals, and notes in the most natural way and record memories in an organized manner. ‚Ä¢ GUIDED JOURNAL:¬† Supports guided journal for tracking mood and activities, Mental Health Journal for managing stress and anxiety, Handwriting¬†Scanner, Gratitude journal, self-improvement, Investment journal, and more. ‚Ä¢ JOURNAL INSIGHTS:¬† Gather insights using mood analyzer from your activity log & mood log. ‚Ä¢ SECURE AND PASSCODE PROTECTED: Journal with lock helps to keep the diary private. Security Code allows keeping your entries private. Data stored in the app is securely protected with diary with lock. ‚Ä¢ EASY-TO-USE: ¬†It's easy-to-use journaling, a routine daily tracker with superior diary/journal experience ‚Äî nothing confusing, nothing complicated- its simple diary for everyday daily writing. Just write and save a journal notebook! Simple diary Calendar view helps to navigate to a previously written lo easily. ‚Ä¢ FREE CONTENT STORAGE WITH AUTO DATA BACKUP: Content/photos included in the daily notes journal will be accessed from different devices and will back up to the cloud automatically. Never need to worry about losing the diary entries and thus safeguarding memories with the diary free app. Notepad diary daily routine included in the app will be accessed with just passcode later on. ‚Ä¢ SPEAK TO WRITE JOURNAL DIARY : Daybook Speech notes feature enable to record voice notes, creating a speech to text entries powered by AI. ‚Ä¢ MULTIPURPOSE USABILITY: Following are some of Daybook use cases. - As an emotion tracker: Capture your feelings that reflect your emotional state, whether you are thankful, filled with gratitude, upset or depressed about something, maybe an illness. Daybook is there for you to rant about anything you wish to, to free your mind and thereby help you lead a quiet, serene life. - As a to-do list app: Journal with pictures helps to organize ideas or thoughts to maximize productivity by making notes and lists instantly. - As a Business diary day planner: Create agendas, write memos, craft presentations as notes using daybook as a task manager app. - As a Trip journal app: Seamlessly enable us to travel journals, including travel photos in an orderly manner. Camera capture enables us to take photos quickly in a simple journal. - As a Daily expense tracker: Organize your receipts, bills, and invoices daily. Note and save! - As a Class notebook: For educational purposes, use it as - ¬†homework tracker, Assignment Planner, simple notebook, a quick reference, creating quick notes with pictures - As a wish list app: A Bullet journal aids note down wish list quickly. Standout features: - Sync entries across platforms such as Mobile, Web, Digital Assistance. - Voice-activated features using Alexa or Google Assistant Upcoming integration: We have planned to include the following features in upcoming updates for the daybook app. - Daily Mood tracker for the diary - Search based on tags or location - Import journal entries Diaro (.zip), Evernote (.enex) and Day One for Share and backup To know more, visit us at https://daybook.app. Follow us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DayBook.diary/ Feedback: We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at daybook.diary@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
Daybook is a FREE, passcode-protected personal diary, journal and notes app available for Android. Daybook helps to record activities, experiences, thoughts, and ideas throughout a day. It lets you organize your created diary/journal entries or notes from the past in the easiest way.

WHY USE DAYBOOK?

‚Ä¢ SAFEGUARD MEMORIES: Daybook enables you to write a private diary, memoir, journals, and notes in the most natural way and record memories in an organized manner.

‚Ä¢ GUIDED JOURNAL:¬† Supports guided journal for tracking mood and activities, Mental Health Journal for managing stress and anxiety, Handwriting¬†Scanner, Gratitude journal, self-improvement, Investment journal, and more.

‚Ä¢ JOURNAL INSIGHTS:¬† Gather insights using mood analyzer from your activity log & mood log.

‚Ä¢ SECURE AND PASSCODE PROTECTED: Journal with lock helps to keep the diary private. Security Code allows keeping your entries private. Data stored in the app is securely protected with diary with lock.

‚Ä¢ EASY-TO-USE: ¬†It's easy-to-use journaling, a routine daily tracker with superior diary/journal experience ‚Äî nothing confusing, nothing complicated- its simple diary for everyday daily writing. Just write and save a journal notebook! Simple diary Calendar view helps to navigate to a previously written lo easily.


‚Ä¢ FREE CONTENT STORAGE WITH AUTO DATA BACKUP: Content/photos included in the daily notes journal will be accessed from different devices and will back up to the cloud automatically. Never need to worry about losing the diary entries and thus safeguarding memories with the diary free app. Notepad diary daily routine included in the app will be accessed with just passcode later on.

‚Ä¢ SPEAK TO WRITE JOURNAL DIARY : Daybook Speech notes feature enable to record voice notes, creating a speech to text entries powered by AI.

‚Ä¢ MULTIPURPOSE USABILITY: Following are some of Daybook use cases.
- As an emotion tracker: Capture your feelings that reflect your emotional state, whether you are thankful, filled with gratitude, upset or depressed about something, maybe an illness. Daybook is there for you to rant about anything you wish to, to free your mind and thereby help you lead a quiet, serene life.
- As a to-do list app: Journal with pictures helps to organize ideas or thoughts to maximize productivity by making notes and lists instantly.
- As a Business diary day planner: Create agendas, write memos, craft presentations as notes using daybook as a task manager app.
- As a Trip journal app: Seamlessly enable us to travel journals, including travel photos in an orderly manner. Camera capture enables us to take photos quickly in a simple journal.
- As a Daily expense tracker: Organize your receipts, bills, and invoices daily. Note and save!
- As a Class notebook: For educational purposes, use it as - ¬†homework tracker, Assignment Planner, simple notebook, a quick reference, creating quick notes with pictures
- As a wish list app: A Bullet journal aids note down wish list quickly.

Standout features:

- Sync entries across platforms such as Mobile, Web, Digital Assistance.
- Voice-activated features using Alexa or Google Assistant


Upcoming integration:

We have planned to include the following features in upcoming updates for the daybook app.

- Daily Mood tracker for the diary
- Search based on tags or location
- Import journal entries Diaro (.zip), Evernote (.enex) and Day One for Share and backup


To know more, visit us at https://daybook.app.

Follow us on facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/DayBook.diary/


Feedback:
We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at daybook.diary@gmail.com

title: MyBubble: Mood Tracker Journal
description:
Build your mental health support Bubble. Become more connected with your family. Find out when someone you love is feeling down - and learn how to spot when they need more support. MyBubble makes it easier to get help at the times when it‚Äôs hardest to ask.

MyBubble is a completely free mindfulness app and support journal; all features in the App are free too!

Journal your mood and track what influences your wellbeing. Get mood alerts from family, and understand the deeper feelings behind each person‚Äôs behaviour.

üìñ JOURNAL YOUR MOOD üìñ
Practice regular daily self-reflection in your mood diary. Sort your moods into Good, Meh and Bad, and tag activities, like work, study and school. Add your innermost thoughts and emotions to the notes section of your diary - you can choose to share your mood, but your notes will only ever be visible to you.

üìà TRACK WHAT TRIGGERS YOUR MOOD üìà
Use MyBubble‚Äôs mood tracker to discover what triggers bad moods, when anxiety crops up, which activities increase stress, and what helps you achieve a sense of wellness. Explore your mental health tracker day by day, and see how your mood trends according to times of day and activities.

üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüëß UNDERSTAND HOW LOVED ONES FEEL üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüëß
When we get stuck in a rut, it can feel impossible to reach out for help. With MyBubble mood indicators, you can understand the outward behaviors your family members exhibit when they‚Äôre feeling Good, Meh and Bad.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

ABOUT MYBUBBLE
Founded by a former soldier in the British army, who struggled with depression and used the brilliant free mental health services available, MyBubble donates 5% of its annual profits to mental health charities.

1 in 4 people suffer with mental health problems in their lifetime, meaning almost every family, friendship group and work team is affected. MyBubble is designed to empower people to address mental health through discussion and connection.

Learn more: https://mybubbleapp.co.uk/
T&Cs: mybubbleapp.co.uk/terms
Privacy Policy: https://mybubbleapp.co.uk/privacy

If you require any assistance with MyBubble then please contact us at support@mybubbleapp.co.uk. We commit to responding to user support issues within 48 hours.

title: CBT Thought Diary
description:
* THE BEST JOURNAL APP TO IMPROVE YOUR MOOD *

CBT Thought Diary is a journal with a purpose: it uses effective tools from Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT), Dialectical Behavioral Therapy (DBT), and Positive Psychology to help improve your mood.

Do you feel like you're always stressed, anxious, sad, frustrated, or unmotivated? The centerpiece of cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) is learning to identify negative and distorted thinking patterns to change your emotions and your behaviors for the better. In CBT, a "thought record" guides you through the steps of identifying, challenging, and reinterpreting negative thinking patterns. With Thought Diary, you can document your negative emotions, analyze flaws in your thinking, and re-evaluate your negative thoughts into more balanced ones. It may even help you recognize helpful ways to deal with your negative behaviors and emotions for future situations.

CBT Thought Diary can do more than thought records, though! It can also be used as a daily mood tracker. You can even practice gratitude by creating positive entries using our flexible diary entry format. According to positive psychology, appreciating the positives in our lives can improve happiness and meaning.
¬†
With CBT Thought Diary, you can gradually change your approach to how you interpret the ups and downs of life, making long-lasting changes in your mental well-being.

According to positive psychology, practicing gratitude and recording positive emotions is important as well. Thought Diary also allows you to keep track of your positive experiences so that you can refer back to them and appreciate the good moments, as well as note down what particular things you're grateful for. This way, you can be more aware and thankful of the positive moments in life.

Thought Diary will help you evaluate, understand, and change your thoughts and feelings. By using this application, you can work to identify your emotions, analyze how and why you're feeling this way, challenge those negative beliefs, change your thinking patterns for future situations, and remember positive experiences. You can use this app as a mood journal, a thought record journal, and a gratitude journal.

Thought Records and Gratitude Journals similar to this app are commonly used in paper form in traditional cognitive-behavioral therapy for a variety of mental health disorders such as clinical depression and anxiety. If you are suffering from a mental health disorder, please consult a mental health professional or healthcare provider. 

Privacy Policy: https://cbtthoughtdiary.com/privacypolicy

Terms Of Service: https://cbtthoughtdiary.com/termsofservice

title: Symptom & Mood Tracker
description: ‚úÖ All your health tracking in one place Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your mood, symptoms, sleep, exercise, diet, and medication? We think all of this should be kept in one convenient place so that you and your doctors can get the full picture of your health. ‚úÖ Reclaim control over your Symptoms & Mood Bearable empowers people to reclaim control over their well-being by making mood and symptom tracking simple, convenient, and accessible. Making entries in our health diary is quick and effortless, so you can focus more energy on feeling better. The app has been shaped by our community of thousands of people with varying chronic health issues. ‚úÖ Gain insights with just a few clicks a day Discover trends and correlations in your habits, symptoms, mood, and more. With just a few clicks each day our intelligent health diary can help you to gain insights into which daily activities and health factors are positively and negatively affecting your mental and physical health. Bearable helps you to: ‚úîÔ∏è Record your mood and symptoms in seconds quickly journal changes in emotions, mental health, and the severity of your symptoms such as pain, fatigue, and symptoms of acute and chronic illness. ‚úîÔ∏è Gain insights into how your daily activities correlate with changes in your mood, symptoms, sleep, and energy. ‚úîÔ∏è Keep everything in one place with our health timeline. Filter your entries to make them even easier to share with your doctor or therapist. ‚úîÔ∏è Fully customise how you journal your daily habits and health factors, such as sleep, diet, exercise, medication, stress, anxiety, emotions and symptoms of acute and chronic illness. ‚úîÔ∏è Come prepared to your next doctor or therapist appointment with a detailed timeline, a complete diary of changes in your well-being, and insights into potential triggers and treatments. ‚úîÔ∏è Make journaling a healthy habit with our quick and enjoyable entry process. And there‚Äôs much more‚Ä¶ ‚ûï Set Reminders. Customise your reminders for healthy habits, medication, mental health check-ins, and more ‚ûï Share and Export. Export your data privately and securely. ‚ûï Sync health data automatically. Such as Sleep, Steps, and Heart Rate from GoogleFit ‚ûï Dark mode. ‚ûï Restore data across devices. üí° Just some of the ways people use Bearable Symptom tracker Mood tracker & journal Emotion tracker Mental health Tracker Anxiety tracker Pain tracker Chronic Illness tracker Medication tracker Health journal & diary üîê PRIVATE & SECURE Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can delete it from within the app at any time. It‚Äôs important to emphasise that we will never under any circumstances sell any personal data to anyone. üíü MADE BY PEOPLE WHO UNDERSTAND AND CARE Created by individuals who have lived with health issues themselves. With feedback and feature requests from a research group of thousands of people with a wide variety of chronic diseases and both mental and physical health conditions, including Anxiety, Depression, CFS (ME), MS (Multiple Sclerosis), Fibromyalgia, Endometriosis, Bipolar, BPD, PTSD, Migraines, Headaches, Vertigo, Cancer (Chemo Symptoms), Arthritis, Crohns, Diabetes, IBS and IBD. Our aim is to make our symptom tracker simple and accessible to everyone, even if suffering from the fatigue and brain fog that often accompanies many conditions. We have created a real sense of community around Bearable and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most. We are committed to improving this app to help as many people to reclaim control over their health as possible. If you have any questions, feedback or feature requests, please send them to james@bearable.app. We‚Äôd love to hear from you. Credit to Freepik for icons
descriptionHTML:
‚úÖ All your health tracking in one place

Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your mood, symptoms, sleep, exercise, diet, and medication? We think all of this should be kept in one convenient place so that you and your doctors can get the full picture of your health.

‚úÖ Reclaim control over your Symptoms & Mood

Bearable empowers people to reclaim control over their well-being by making mood and symptom tracking simple, convenient, and accessible. Making entries in our health diary is quick and effortless, so you can focus more energy on feeling better.

The app has been shaped by our community of thousands of people with varying chronic health issues.

‚úÖ Gain insights with just a few clicks a day

Discover trends and correlations in your habits, symptoms, mood, and more.

With just a few clicks each day our intelligent health diary can help you to gain insights into which daily activities and health factors are positively and negatively affecting your mental and physical health.


Bearable helps you to:

‚úîÔ∏è Record your mood and symptoms in seconds quickly journal changes in emotions, mental health, and the severity of your symptoms such as pain, fatigue, and symptoms of acute and chronic illness.


‚úîÔ∏è Gain insights into how your daily activities correlate with changes in your mood, symptoms, sleep, and energy.


‚úîÔ∏è Keep everything in one place with our health timeline. Filter your entries to make them even easier to share with your doctor or therapist.


‚úîÔ∏è Fully customise how you journal your daily habits and health factors, such as sleep, diet, exercise, medication, stress, anxiety, emotions and symptoms of acute and chronic illness.


‚úîÔ∏è Come prepared to your next doctor or therapist appointment with a detailed timeline, a complete diary of changes in your well-being, and insights into potential triggers and treatments.


‚úîÔ∏è Make journaling a healthy habit with our quick and enjoyable entry process.


And there‚Äôs much more‚Ä¶


‚ûï Set Reminders. Customise your reminders for healthy habits, medication, mental health check-ins, and more

‚ûï Share and Export. Export your data privately and securely.

‚ûï Sync health data automatically. Such as Sleep, Steps, and Heart Rate from GoogleFit

‚ûï Dark mode.

‚ûï Restore data across devices.


üí° Just some of the ways people use Bearable

Symptom tracker
Mood tracker & journal
Emotion tracker
Mental health Tracker
Anxiety tracker
Pain tracker
Chronic Illness tracker
Medication tracker
Health journal & diary


üîê PRIVATE & SECURE

Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can delete it from within the app at any time. It‚Äôs important to emphasise that we will never under any circumstances sell any personal data to anyone.


üíü MADE BY PEOPLE WHO UNDERSTAND AND CARE

Created by individuals who have lived with health issues themselves. With feedback and feature requests from a research group of thousands of people with a wide variety of chronic diseases and both mental and physical health conditions, including Anxiety, Depression, CFS (ME), MS (Multiple Sclerosis), Fibromyalgia, Endometriosis, Bipolar, BPD, PTSD, Migraines, Headaches, Vertigo, Cancer (Chemo Symptoms), Arthritis, Crohns, Diabetes, IBS and IBD.

Our aim is to make our symptom tracker simple and accessible to everyone, even if suffering from the fatigue and brain fog that often accompanies many conditions.

We have created a real sense of community around Bearable and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most. We are committed to improving this app to help as many people to reclaim control over their health as possible. If you have any questions, feedback or feature requests, please send them to james@bearable.app. We‚Äôd love to hear from you.

Credit to Freepik for icons

title: Track - Calorie Counter
description:
Nutritionix Track is a fitness tracking app developed and maintained by a team of registered dietitians. Making fitness tracking a daily habit is an effective way to work towards your health goals, so the mission of the Track app is to take the heavy-lifting out of keeping up with your food log.

Track‚Äôs simplicity and efficiency is why our users don‚Äôt just give food logging a try ‚Äì they stick with it. 

Check it out:

Log all of your foods in as little as 60 seconds per day thanks to the following features:
- Predictive search
- State-of-the-art Natural Language processing technology
- Instant barcode scanning

What can I track?

- Food intake
- Nutrient totals 
- Exercise
- Weight and weight progress
- Calorie and macro goals
- Water intake

The unrivalled Nutritionix database offers:
- 800K+ unique foods
- Coverage of 95% of grocery items in the US and Canada
- 760+ US restaurant chain menus
- Thousands of common foods recipes created by our in-house team of dietitians
- We are adding and updating hundreds of foods every day!

Create custom recipes and food items:
- Advanced recipe creation tool for logging custom recipes in seconds
- Custom Foods tool for one-off items
- Share your recipes easily!

Additional features
- Download your data as a spreadsheet with our Export feature
- Keep tabs on your progress with the Stats view
- Fitbit sync

Track Pro
Upgrade to Track Pro to access the Coach Portal and share your Track food log with your dietitian, trainer, or other ‚Äòcoach‚Äô.
- Become a premium Track user by subscribing to Track Pro. Subscription prices start at $5.99 USD/month for the monthly subscription and $29 USD/year for the annual subscription. Prices are in U.S. dollars, are subject to change, and may vary in countries other than the U.S.
- 2 month free trial for premium features.
- If you choose to purchase Track Pro, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the 2-month trial period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes store after purchase.
- Are you a dietitian or trainer with clients using Nutritionix Track? It is easy and free to register as a Coach.

Privacy: http://www.nutritionix.com/privacy
Terms: https://www.nutritionix.com/terms

Have any feedback? Please let us know at support@nutritionix.com

Track‚Äôs simplicity and efficiency is why our users don‚Äôt just give food logging a try ‚Äì they stick with it.

title: Daylio Journal - Mood Tracker
description: Daylio enables you to keep a private journal without having to type a single line. Try this beautifully designed & stunningly simple micro-diary app right now for FREE! üòÅ WHAT IS DAYLIO Daylio is a very versatile app, and you can turn it in whatever you need to track. Your fitness goal pal. Your mental health coach. Your gratitude diary. Mood tracker. Your photo food log. Exercise, meditate, eat, and be grateful. Take care of your mental, emotional, and physical health. Good self-care is a key to improved mood and reduced anxiety. This is the time for your well-being, self-improvement, and self-care. Use Daylio as your daily bullet journal or goal tracker. We build it on three principles: ‚úÖ Reach happiness and self-improvement by being mindful of your days. ‚úÖ Validate your hunches. How does your new hobby influence your life? ‚úÖ Form a new habit in an obstacle-free environment ‚Äì no learning curve. Daylio is super simple to use ‚Äì create your first entry in two steps. For anxiety and stress relief, make sure to include activities that help you to cope with negativity. Everybody can use a mood boost! You can measure their impact on your mood in stats. ü§î HOW DOES IT WORK Pick your mood and add activities you have been doing during the day. You can also add notes and keep a more traditional diary with photos. Daylio is collecting recorded moods and activities in the statistics and calendar. This format will help you to understand your habits better. Keep track of your activities and create patterns to become more productive! You can review all entries in the charts or the calendar and share them with your friends. To make it even better, Daylio allows you: ‚≠ê Make reflection a daily habit ‚≠ê Discover what makes you happy ‚≠ê Use a big database of beautiful icons for your personalized activities ‚≠ê Relive your memories via a photo diary ‚≠ê Mix and match your own moods using funny emojis ‚≠ê Explore exciting statistics about your life on weekly, monthly, or yearly charts ‚≠ê Deep dive into advanced statistics for every mood, activity, or group ‚≠ê Customize color themes ‚≠ê Enjoy nights with dark mode ‚≠ê See your whole year in 'Year in Pixels' ‚≠ê Create daily, weekly or monthly goals and motivate yourself ‚≠ê Build habits and collect achievements ‚≠ê Share statistics with your friends ‚≠ê Safely back up and restore your entries via your private Google Drive ‚≠ê Set reminders and never forget to create a memory ‚≠ê Turn on the PIN lock and keep your diary safe ‚≠ê Export PDF and CSV documents to share or print your entries üßê PRIVACY AND SECURITY Daylio is by principle a private journal since we do not store or collect your data. At Daylio, we believe in transparency and honesty. Your data is stored locally on your phone. You can optionally schedule backups to your private cloud storage or take your backup file with you anywhere. Data are entirely under your control at all times. Data stored in the app's private directories are not accessible by any other apps or processes. Your backups are transferred to Google Drive via the secure (encrypted) channels. We don't send your data to our servers. We don't have access to your entries. Also, any other third-party app can't read your data.
descriptionHTML:
Daylio enables you to keep a private journal without having to type a single line. Try this beautifully designed & stunningly simple micro-diary app right now for FREE!


üòÅ WHAT IS DAYLIO

Daylio is a very versatile app, and you can turn it in whatever you need to track. Your fitness goal pal. Your mental health coach. Your gratitude diary. Mood tracker. Your photo food log. Exercise, meditate, eat, and be grateful. Take care of your mental, emotional, and physical health. Good self-care is a key to improved mood and reduced anxiety.

This is the time for your well-being, self-improvement, and self-care. Use Daylio as your daily bullet journal or goal tracker. We build it on three principles:

‚úÖ Reach happiness and self-improvement by being mindful of your days.
‚úÖ Validate your hunches. How does your new hobby influence your life?
‚úÖ Form a new habit in an obstacle-free environment ‚Äì no learning curve. Daylio is super simple to use ‚Äì create your first entry in two steps.

For anxiety and stress relief, make sure to include activities that help you to cope with negativity. Everybody can use a mood boost! You can measure their impact on your mood in stats.


ü§î HOW DOES IT WORK

Pick your mood and add activities you have been doing during the day. You can also add notes and keep a more traditional diary with photos. Daylio is collecting recorded moods and activities in the statistics and calendar. This format will help you to understand your habits better. Keep track of your activities and create patterns to become more productive!

You can review all entries in the charts or the calendar and share them with your friends.

To make it even better, Daylio allows you:
‚≠ê Make reflection a daily habit
‚≠ê Discover what makes you happy
‚≠ê Use a big database of beautiful icons for your personalized activities
‚≠ê Relive your memories via a photo diary
‚≠ê Mix and match your own moods using funny emojis
‚≠ê Explore exciting statistics about your life on weekly, monthly, or yearly charts
‚≠ê Deep dive into advanced statistics for every mood, activity, or group
‚≠ê Customize color themes
‚≠ê Enjoy nights with dark mode
‚≠ê See your whole year in 'Year in Pixels'
‚≠ê Create daily, weekly or monthly goals and motivate yourself
‚≠ê Build habits and collect achievements
‚≠ê Share statistics with your friends
‚≠ê Safely back up and restore your entries via your private Google Drive
‚≠ê Set reminders and never forget to create a memory
‚≠ê Turn on the PIN lock and keep your diary safe
‚≠ê Export PDF and CSV documents to share or print your entries


üßê PRIVACY AND SECURITY

Daylio is by principle a private journal since we do not store or collect your data.

At Daylio, we believe in transparency and honesty. Your data is stored locally on your phone. You can optionally schedule backups to your private cloud storage or take your backup file with you anywhere. Data are entirely under your control at all times.

Data stored in the app's private directories are not accessible by any other apps or processes. Your backups are transferred to Google Drive via the secure (encrypted) channels.

We don't send your data to our servers. We don't have access to your entries. Also, any other third-party app can't read your data.

title: I Am Sober
description:
I Am Sober is more than just a free sobriety counter app.

Along with tracking your sober days, it helps you build new habits and provides ongoing motivation by connecting you to a wide network of people all striving for the same goal: staying sober one day at a time.

Through our growing sober community you can learn from others and contribute by sharing insights and tactics that have helped you quit your addiction.

**The I Am Sober App Features:**

‚ñ∫ Sober day tracker
Visualize how long you‚Äôve been sober and monitor your sobriety journey over time. Track the time you spend without drinking, smoking, etc. Count your sober days. 

‚ñ∫ Remember why you quit your addiction
Add reasons and photos to help you remember why you want to quit your addiction, stay sober and build new habits. Get motivated and enjoy your recovery.

‚ñ∫ Daily pledge tracker
Take a pledge every day. Sobriety is a 24-hour struggle, so start your day off by making a pledge to stay sober. Then you can review how your day went and log notes at the end of the day. 

‚ñ∫ Sobriety calculator
View how much money & time you‚Äôve saved since you quit by being sober. 

‚ñ∫ Analyze triggers
Recap each day and find patterns that made your day easier or more challenging than the last. Track your habits and be aware of the change.  

‚ñ∫ Share your story
Either with others or for yourself, take photos and journal your recovery progress directly in the app. Then choose to share it or save it as a reminder for yourself.

‚ñ∫ Milestone tracker
Track and celebrate your recovery milestones from 1 day, to 1 week, to 1 month and beyond. Compare experiences with others on their sober journey. Read how they felt at this milestone and what you can expect. If you‚Äôre struggling, share your story and invite others to offer help or advice.

‚ñ∫ Withdrawal timeline
When you create an account and declare your addiction you want to quit, you can instantly see a withdrawal timeline to get an idea of what to expect for your next few days (and weeks). What‚Äôs more, you can contribute to it. See how many others saw an increase in their restfulness vs those that saw an increase in anxiety. Prepare yourself for what‚Äôs to come in recovery.

‚ñ∫ Customize your experience
You set the time, your sober birthday, the category of motivation you need, the addictions you‚Äôre trying to quit, even the end-of-day summaries. Make the app customized to your lifestyle and tailored to your needs and habits.

**Sober Plus Subscriptions**

I Am Sober is free to use, but you can support development of the app with a subscription to Sober Plus. With Sober Plus, you'll get access to these premium features:

‚ñ∫ Create a group
Stay accountable and recover together. Track your sobriety privately with the help of anonymous meetings. Groups are great for complimenting your real-world group like Alcoholics Anonymous (AA), NA, SA, SMART Recovery, or your rehab center.

‚ñ∫ Locked access
Keep your sobriety trackers private with a lock that you can access via TouchID or FaceID.

‚ñ∫ Data Backups
Save your recovery progress in the cloud and restore your sobriety trackers if you get a new device.

‚ñ∫ Sobriety counter for all addictions
Track more addictions and get access to more recovery communities. Even if your addiction is specific like Wine, Online Shopping, or Skin Picking, you‚Äôll find a variety of communities of people who are all trying to get sober from alcohol, drinking, drugs, smoking, eating disorders, self-harm, and more.

Take care of your pet by taking care of yourself! While recording easily, you can get in-depth emotion tracking data analysis to help you know more about your mental health. Day by day, you will see changes in yourself. Reasons for choosing this emotion tracker app üíü Professional and free Self care tracker app ‚ÄúMood Tracker - Self-Care Tracker & Habit Tracker‚Äù is an emotion tracking app that helps people improve their mental health by following good habits, getting rid of anxiety, and depression. The "Mood Tracker - Self-Care Tracker & Habit Tracker" also provides some selfcare practices to help users, like meditate, sleep tracking, gratitude diary and decompression games. üêß Get your mood tracker pet With ‚ÄúMood Tracker - Self-Care Tracker & Habit Tracker‚Äù , you will have a penguin friend. As your self care tracker pet, whether you are in a bad mood or happy mood, it will always be with you and listen to you. üìä Learn from your experiences ‚Äú Mood Tracker - Self-Care Tracker & Habit Tracker ‚Äù aims to better connect how daily routine impacts how they‚Äôve been feeling. Emotion tracker is a mental health tracking tool that helps you see the daily mood tracker patterns of what else is going on when you‚Äôre feeling irritable, depressed, or anxious. With ‚ÄúMood Tracker - Self-Care Tracker & Habit Tracker‚Äù, you can see the mood balance between mooda and activities. Which actions lead to good mood or bad mood. Also, you will understand the impact of habits tracker on emotions. Keep using this emotion tracking, self-care tracker app, then you will get mood balance reports and mood meters. üîñ Good Habits tracker Have you heard of the 50 best habits in life? Then find them in this app. Good habits always bring happiness. Mood tracker is a free habit tracking app which helps you set goals to build habits and solve your bad habits. With this app, you can track habits complete status, you can get habit tracking reminders. üåü Easy and beautiful Mood journal The simple interface of ‚Äú Mood Tracker - Self-Care Tracker & Habit Tracker ‚Äù allows you to record daily mood balance and track habits easier, then get plenty of emotion tracking graphs trends over time. Keeping a mood journal, anxiety journal, and bullet journal is a fun way to keep track of emotions and mental health. üìÖ Calendar view ‚Äú Mood Tracker - Self-Care Tracker & Habit Tracker ‚Äù provides an emotion tracking calendar perspective. Make it easier for users to have a general view of daily emotion change and mood balance. ‚òÅÔ∏è Sync and backup - Never lose Sync your emotion tracking records and habit tracking history to the cloud via google drive, never lost. Checking and tracking habits and moods on different devices. üóÇ Habit tracker and mood balance Widget Add the mood balance widget to the desktop of the phone. Then you will access your daily mood tracker anytime, anywhere. Add the habit tracker widget to your phone, never miss the important tracked habits. In summary, ‚Äú Mood Tracker - Self-Care Tracker & Habit Tracker ‚Äù is really a good emotion tracker, habit tracker, self care tracker and mental health app, and worthy of your installation and try. title: Sanvello: Anxiety & Depression
description:
Whether you‚Äôre feeling anxious, lonely, overwhelmed, or just burned out, Sanvello will meet you where you‚Äôre at. Think of it as your feel-better toolkit, including therapy, coaching, coping techniques, meditations, and goal and mood tracking, designed by experts to help you feel better.  

Best of all, your Sanvello journey is customizable to you. The app checks in with how you're feeling so you can track your emotions and progress over time. As patterns are identified, Sanvello will provide customized tools, rooted in cognitive behavioral therapy, to keep you on the path to feeling better. 

Take time for yourself by downloading Sanvello today. 
 

FREE ACCESS THROUGH HEALTH PLANS (U.S. ONLY): 
Over 40 million Americans have Sanvello Premium included in their health plans and Sanvello Therapy is in-network for 90 million. Check your plan instantly in the app. No insurance or outside the U.S.? No problem‚Äîmany of our most popular tools and guides are free to ensure everyone can take care of their mental health, plus we have affordable self-pay subscriptions for that extra bit of support. 
 

SELF-CARE:  
Get started by checking in with your mood or taking one of our assessments to get your stress, anxiety, and depression scores. This establishes your baseline and helps us recommend personalized in-app activities to get you on the path to feeling better. Go on the ‚ÄúBraving Anxiety‚Äù Guided Journey with John Green, or ‚ÄúFeeling Better‚Äù with Kati Morton. Want to chart your own course? Explore our library of coping tools, thought reframing exercises, meditations, and more.  
 

COMMUNITY:  
You‚Äôre not alone: The Sanvello community is millions strong, and they find each other in the Sanvello community. Get a fresh perspective on anxiety, gratitude, and dozens of other topics by anonymously participating in active discussion boards and chat groups. 
 

THERAPY: 
Feel better in half the time of traditional therapy with Sanvello Therapy, which matches you with a licensed clinician‚Äîand includes a mental health coach and Premium access to self-care content at no-cost while you‚Äôre in therapy. Therapy is only available in the U.S. in the following states: AZ, CA, CO, FL, GA, IL, IN, MA, MD, MI, MN, MO, NJ, NY, NC, OH, PA, RI, TN, TX, VA, WA, WI. Have a therapist you love already? They can use Sanvello for Clinicians to assign activities and see your progress.  
 

COACHING:  
Face new challenges with help from someone you can trust. Sanvello Coaches provide direction, support, and motivation through 1:1 messaging‚Äîjudgment free. Your coach is there to be your sounding board in achieving your goals. You also have an all-access pass to group coaching sessions‚Äîlive classes that help you apply the concepts of CBT to real life‚Äîand all our self-care tools within the app. Sanvello Coaching is only available in the U.S. 

 

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS: 
Sanvello is free to download and use. The premium version of Sanvello allows for unlimited use of all tools and is available through many major health plans (‚Äúupgrade via insurance‚Äù) or through an auto-renewing subscription. Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will renew automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the current period ends. Your Google Play account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the price listed above. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your Google account settings but refunds will not be provided for the unused portion of the term. If a free trial period is offered, it will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed. 

Terms of Service: https://sanvello.com/tos/    

Privacy Policy: https://sanvello.com/privacy-policy/  
 
Help: https://help.sanvello.com or info@sanvello.com
