title: Prompted Journal
description:
A daily journal for self-compassion.

Be your own best friend, cheerleader, spiritual guru, etc. with our carefully crafted daily journal prompts. It‚Äôs an easy way to incorporate self reflection into your life, and reflect on all the things that matter. 

Your diary is not just about writing what you ate for lunch. Instead, you can befriend yourself with thought-provoking prompts from day one. Reflect on your hopes and dreams, and really listen to yourself like a compassionate friend. If you‚Äôve ever struggled to keep up with a diary, our daily journal prompts can remove the struggle of thinking of things to say, and make this journaling habit easy to maintain.

Each journal prompt comes with ‚ÄúDive Deeper‚Äù questions to help you get the most out of your self care journal:
E.g. For the writing prompt: ‚ÄúLove is‚Ä¶‚Äù, reflect on Dive Deeper questions like ‚ÄúHow do you show love towards others? How do others show love towards you? What was your first memory of feeling loved? Does love have a spiritual dimension for you? If so, how?‚Äù 
The Dive Deeper questions help prevent writer‚Äôs block, making journaling a powerful wellness tool from day one.

A daily diary can seem daunting, even tedious ‚Äî when in fact, journaling can be a powerful self care habit. Read through our reviews: you‚Äôll find users who have used this app as a therapy journal, a self help aid, and a thought diary of everything important to them. Your daily journal can be a deeply rewarding wellness ritual that helps you write thoughts you might have otherwise ignored. We hope Prompted Journal helps you uncover more of what you‚Äôre meant be. 

This writing app can feel like traveling through time. On day one, you‚Äôll write a letter to your future self (1st prompt: Dear Future Me). About 3-4 months later, when the prompt recycles, you‚Äôll be able to read your letter. While we love the physical diary, writing apps make it possible to instantly find the last time you answered the same journal prompt, or view ALL the times you answered the prompt at once. Watch your self esteem improve with each new cycle: your answers to journal prompts like ‚ÄúMy biggest fear‚Ä¶‚Äù might show how you have overcome anxiety. This writing app becomes a conversation between you, your past self, and your future self. Your diary becomes a memento of how much you‚Äôve grown. Just by incorporating a simple 5 minute journal habit into your life, you can get to know yourself again.

WHAT YOU GET:
* Self care journaling for busy lives: 190+ journal prompts ready to go, recurring every 3-4 months.
* Daily reminders help you write and reflect every day.
* Create a PDF of your diary to print, email, or save.
* Daily journaling made easy.

Life is a journey, and our prompts are designed to help you reflect daily on where you‚Äôre heading. Write your thoughts on everything from mental health to love to self esteem. Make the five minute journal session you can squeeze into your mornings equate to five hours of talking with your best friend. Also, customize your guided journal by making journal prompts that only you can: e.g. ‚ÄúMy dog Lucy and I‚Ä¶‚Äù With a wide range of topics you can reflect on, you can see yourself in from various angles. 

OUR MISSION:
Self help and self therapy are difficult because all the incredible books and spot-on teachings don‚Äôt force you to put them into practice. ‚ÄúLove yourself,‚Äù ‚ÄúBe grateful,‚Äù etc. sound simple, but can be surprisingly hard to do. We hope our writing apps turn apparently ‚Äúsimple‚Äù self help mantras like ‚ÄúLove yourself‚Äù into wellness habits you can practice daily.

* We specialize in writing apps that foster self care and wellness. Please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us.

WE RESPECT YOUR PRIVACY:
Your daily journal is yours and yours alone. We don‚Äôt store any of your data or ask you to create an account. We built this diary journal with your privacy in mind. 

Privacy Policy: https://darlingapps.com/our-apps-privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://darlingapps.com/terms-of-service

About 3-4 months later, when the prompt recycles, you‚Äôll be able to read your letter. While we love the physical diary, writing apps make it possible to instantly find the last time you answered the same journal prompt, or view ALL the times you answered the prompt at once. Watch your self esteem improve with each new cycle: your answers to journal prompts like ‚ÄúMy biggest fear‚Ä¶‚Äù might show how you have overcome anxiety. This writing app becomes a conversation between you, your past self, and your future self. Your diary becomes a memento of how much you‚Äôve grown. Just by incorporating a simple 5 minute journal habit into your life, you can get to know yourself again.

WHAT YOU GET:
* Self care journaling for busy lives: 190+ journal prompts ready to go, recurring every 3-4 months.
* Daily reminders help you write and reflect every day.
* Create a PDF of your diary to print, email, or save.
* Daily journaling made easy.

Life is a journey, and our prompts are designed to help you reflect daily on where you‚Äôre heading. Write your thoughts on everything from mental health to love to self esteem. Make the five minute journal session you can squeeze into your mornings equate to five hours of talking with your best friend. Also, customize your guided journal by making journal prompts that only you can: e.g. ‚ÄúMy dog Lucy and I‚Ä¶‚Äù With a wide range of topics you can reflect on, you can see yourself in from various angles.

OUR MISSION:
Self help and self therapy are difficult because all the incredible books and spot-on teachings don‚Äôt force you to put them into practice. ‚ÄúLove yourself,‚Äù ‚ÄúBe grateful,‚Äù etc. sound simple, but can be surprisingly hard to do. We hope our writing apps turn apparently ‚Äúsimple‚Äù self help mantras like ‚ÄúLove yourself‚Äù into wellness habits you can practice daily.

* We specialize in writing apps that foster self care and wellness. Please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us.

WE RESPECT YOUR PRIVACY:
Your daily journal is yours and yours alone. We don‚Äôt store any of your data or ask you to create an account. We built this diary journal with your privacy in mind.

Privacy Policy: https://darlingapps.com/our-apps-privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://darlingapps.com/terms-of-service

title: Simple Mood Tracker & Diary
description:
Mood Month is the simple but effective mood tracking app and diary. Track your daily moods with different emotions and keep a record of how your mood is changing throughout the months. You can also write down your thoughts each day and keep a diary of how you are feeling, what's making you happy or what's making you sad.

Mood Month keeps track of what's important by checking how you feel each day and allows you to keep a diary so you can write down anything that is important to tracking your mood. Keep this app on your phone and remember to track your mood daily. Mood Month keeps it simple by letting you track your mood with 5 options and if there is anything you need to add, you can use the diary notes to track your day. This way tracking your mood every single day is as less time consuming as it can be.

Check your progress throughout the months with the personalised mood tracking section that shows your mood statistics. Also see your mood tracked across a graph to get a better understanding of any patterns or warnings.

Tracking your mood and keeping a diary is a private and personal activity. Mood Month lets you lock the app so only you can access it with your personal pin or fingerprint.

If you're looking for just a simple diary, then this app can be just that but Mood Month will also encourage you to simply and through the click of one button link a mood with your diary entry so you can start the beneficial process of tracking your mood.

Features of Mood Month - Mood Tracker & Diary:
- Easily track your moods with 5 simple but varying mood options
- Keep a diary of your days along with your moods
- Check your progress and see how your mood is changing in several ways including a graph
- Lock your personal mood tracking information with a pin
- Quick and productive: Daily tracking is not time consuming

title: Day One Journal: Private Diary
description:
Day One is the journaling app that reinvented journaling. Completely private, cross-platform, and designed to never fill up, it‚Äôs designed to let you capture your life as you live it. Use Day One as a daily diary, note taking app, travel log, or gratitude journal. 

‚ÄúDay One creates something so rare it feels almost sacred: A completely private digital space.‚Äù ‚Äì New York Times

‚ÄúDay One makes keeping a journal delightfully easy.‚Äù ‚Äì Wired

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs perfect! Does what it says on the box. I was able to import my stuff from another (pricey) journal so that I didn‚Äôt lose those entries. It‚Äôs easy to add multiple entries to a day and to keep pictures. And it‚Äôs lockable, keeping private thoughts protected. I will happily use Day One for years.‚Äù ‚Äì Day One user

PRESERVE EVERY MEMORY

- Unlimited text entries
- Unlimited photos*
- Different journals for every aspect of your life*
- IFTTT shortcuts allow importing data from Spotify, YouTube, Strava, Fitbit, Facebook, Twitter, and more

PRIVATE AND SECURE 
- Automatic backups keep your journal entries safe
- End-to-end encryption, which is a fancy way of saying your entries are 100% private
- Journal entries stay secure with passcode or Fingerprint lock 
- Export options (PDF, JSON) ensure your entries always stay yours
- Seamless sync across multiple devices

FORM A HABIT & STAY CONSISTENT 
- Programmable journaling reminders
- Unique, daily journal prompts help eliminate writer‚Äôs cramp 

- SIMPLE TO USE, EASY TO LOVE
- Beautiful, award-winning design
- Powerful rich text formatting
- Ability to star favorite entries to revisit quickly 

DELIGHT IN THE DETAILS
- Time, date, and weather are automatically added to every entry
- On This Day feature allows you to revisit past memories
- Tags, favorites, and search filters make it easy to find what you‚Äôre looking for
- Map view quickly shows all the places you‚Äôve journaled from

* Day One is FREE to use forever with unlimited entries. To get more out of Day One, try Premium free for 1 month.

Privacy Policy: https://dayoneapp.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/
For technical assistance or other inquiries: https://dayoneapp.com/contact/

title: My Dark Diary
descriptionHTML:
Your personal life journal with vampire/dark theme: notepad, tasks organizer/manager and diary, protected with a password.

*** Features ***
- the application's UI is in English;
- set a password, lock the journal;
- create to do list;
- organize all your tasks, sort by priority, set color for a task;
- weekly tasks view;
- simple notepad - keep all your notes/memos;
- simple diary with emoticons and weather icons;
- with advertisements;
- not adapted for tablets;

*** Password ***
- to see the options for changing it press the menu button (or menu on the navigation bar) on your phone on the first screen;
- it can be set and change from the first screen - menu "Change password";
- if you forget it, you can see it from the first screen menu - "Forgotten password";
- the Skip button is only to look at the diary and decide if you will use it. After setting a password the Skip button will disappear;

If you have any questions, please e-mail me: diarytheapp@gmail.com

title: Journey: Diary, Journal
description: Join millions of Journey users and create a healthier, happier mind. A sanctuary for your mind and soul, Journey will help increase your positive energy, be more grateful and a calmer mind by building healthy thinkings through journaling. We‚Äôre more than just a journal, or a diary; we‚Äôre your own motivational coach and happiness trainer. Let's embark on a fabulous journey of self-improvement today. Top Reasons You Need Journey: ‚ÅÉ Want to find a place to keep daily reflections privately ‚ÅÉ Want to pour your feelings/brain dump ‚ÅÉ Want to keep a affirmation and gratitude list ‚ÅÉ Struggle to maintain a journaling routine ‚ÅÉ Want to get out of depression ‚ÅÉ Have anxiety and cannot calm the thoughts in your mind ‚ÅÉ Track the achievements you've made in life Journey Benefits: ‚ÅÉ Focus and Concentration ‚ÅÉ Better Sleep ‚ÅÉ Managing Stress ‚ÅÉ Calming Anxieties and Meditation ‚ÅÉ Happiness ‚ÅÉ Healthier Mind ‚ÅÉ Better Habits ‚ÅÉ Motivation Integrated Coaching: Ready for a healthier mind? Take your life to a new level by using our integrated journaling prompts by Journey coach: ‚ÅÉ Inspire Me "One good quote is worth a book". Receive daily inspirational quotes by famous people. Think and write how the idea applies to your life. ‚ÅÉ Gratitude 365 "Whether you appreciated and give thanks for will increase in your life". Write 3 things you are grateful based on a topic of the day. ‚ÅÉ Love & relationship Reflect on your romantic relationship and identify habits that you need to build, problems that you need to fix, and the issues that you need to prevent in your relationship. And More... Journey Features: ‚ÅÉ Sync to cloud via Google Drive ‚ÅÉ Passcode and fingerprint protected ‚ÅÉ Available on mobile, desktop and web ‚ÅÉ Integrate Journey coach: a daily/weekly journaling prompt ‚ÅÉ Beginners step-by-step guide to journaling ‚ÅÉ View entries in timeline, calendar, map ‚ÅÉ Advanced search: Activity, mood, favorites ‚ÅÉ Compose entries via email ‚ÅÉ Link to Zapier - View your journals on Wear OS To learn about Journey, please visit this page: https://journey.cloud.

title: Thera: Diary and mood tracker
description:
Thera: Diary and mood tracker

Modern life is dynamic and requires constant concentration, attention, investment of time, and effort. We need to constantly be aware of new trends, understand a lot of things, and be able to apply new technologies. This rhythm is reflected in psychological health. To control anxiety, track your mood, and plan your goals and desires, there is a new mental health app Thera.

Thera is: ‚Ä¢ individual mood tracker; ‚Ä¢ mental health tracker; ‚Ä¢ emotion tracker; ‚Ä¢ secret diary (diary with password); ‚Ä¢ dream journal; ‚Ä¢ dream diary; ‚Ä¢ guided journal; ‚Ä¢ mood log; ‚Ä¢ anxiety meditation; ‚Ä¢ thought diary; ‚Ä¢ sleep diary. and much more‚Ä¶‚Ä¶

The application guarantees privacy The four sections of the application will help you cope with anxiety, stabilize your mood, find goals and use your imagination for desires.

- Wish diary -

Working on goals and desires will help overcome stress, overcome depression, and set priorities. Journaling will improve mental health, and raise the mood.

- Gratitude journal, where there is a choice of 365 gratitude journal -

gratitude to yourself - anxiety release, will raise self-esteem; gratitude to the universe - will help overcome depression and social anxiety; gratitude for others will teach you to be more tolerant.

- Diary of fears -

It will help to understand the cause of anxiety, and anxiety release, conduct anxiety meditation, and understand what prevents you from becoming happier and what needs to be done.

-Mood log -

Daily journaling will help analyze your mood and emotions. Choose from the mood board the emotions that you are currently experiencing, and the journal prompts will help you understand the cause of rainy mood, anxiety, and depression

title: My Diary & Journal with Lock
description: Quillio is a unique personalized diary journal that allows you to write anything from quick notes in seconds to long life-changing insights using colorful themes, audio recordings, and photos. Writing journal has never been easier before. This personal diary with a lock has so many options that millions of users have a million different versions of my diary app. ‚ú®A digital journal with a lock is a safer and more practical version than a traditional journal notebook with a pencil. ‚ú®We personalized UI/UX so if you write daily diaries with a personal touch, you will start to call this app ‚Äúmy diary‚Äù. ‚ú®You will get a daily diary that is visually pleasing and easy to use. Why you should try My Diary & Journal with Lock: üìí Secret Diary - Write, it's good for you. A gratitude daily diary can be a great way to improve your mood. You can record your parties, use emojis as a mood tracker, and include photos in this journal with lock. Use it as your private, secure daily journal notebook and free writing diary. üé® Themes and Fonts - When writing private journals at night it is better to use a dark theme, and my diary offers you beautiful dark themes. There are also a lot of other delightful themes that may suit you at any other time. You can sort your daily diary and notes by time, date, or alphabetical order. Use bold, italic, underline, and dozens of other options. üì∏ Photo Journal - Save your memories by uploading photos to your daily diary. You can create a journey journal by adding your adventure photos. Upload your before and after fitness transformation photos, your favorite recipes, and private photos of you and your loved ones. We give you all the freedom to create your personal photo diary. üîê Codelock - It's time to transfer the secrets from your mind to a journal with a lock. This private diary journal will keep your secrets after setting your diary password. Use my secret diary with a lock anywhere, any time, as much as you want. My secret diary will never let your memories down. ü§© Mood leaderboard - With various adorable stickers, this free diary journal can be used as a mood diary tracker software. It will help you in mood tracking and accompanying any event worth recording, such as the laughs with your pals about memories or lessons from your mistakes. ‚òÅÔ∏è Backup to Dropbox and Google Drive - Record your life secrets in my diary and save them right into a digital diary for eternity. Export the daily journal to TXT or include a photo journal and save them to PDF. Restore your daily diary with a lock in a few clicks on any Android device. üèÜ Achievements - By writing 15 notes you will become a Scribe. Using 6 different emojis will make you Emoticonist. Create notes with 3 or more photos in my diary journal and you are a Paparazzi. üîî Reminder - We will send you a gentle and friendly reminder to stay consistent with writing journal in my dairy journal app. üìå Other options - Motivational, inspirational, and life-changing Quillio quotes in more than 30 languages. Whether you want to call this app a mood diary or my diary, journal with lock or simply journal app you will not be wrong. Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/quilliodiaryapp/

üé® Themes and Fonts - When writing private journals at night it is better to use a dark theme, and my diary offers you beautiful dark themes. There are also a lot of other delightful themes that may suit you at any other time. You can sort your daily diary and notes by time, date, or alphabetical order. Use bold, italic, underline, and dozens of other options.

üì∏ Photo Journal - Save your memories by uploading photos to your daily diary. You can create a journey journal by adding your adventure photos. Upload your before and after fitness transformation photos, your favorite recipes, and private photos of you and your loved ones. We give you all the freedom to create your personal photo diary.

üîê Codelock - It's time to transfer the secrets from your mind to a journal with a lock. This private diary journal will keep your secrets after setting your diary password. Use my secret diary with a lock anywhere, any time, as much as you want. My secret diary will never let your memories down.

ü§© Mood leaderboard - With various adorable stickers, this free diary journal can be used as a mood diary tracker software. It will help you in mood tracking and accompanying any event worth recording, such as the laughs with your pals about memories or lessons from your mistakes.

‚òÅÔ∏è Backup to Dropbox and Google Drive - Record your life secrets in my diary and save them right into a digital diary for eternity. Export the daily journal to TXT or include a photo journal and save them to PDF. Restore your daily diary with a lock in a few clicks on any Android device.

üèÜ Achievements - By writing 15 notes you will become a Scribe. Using 6 different emojis will make you Emoticonist. Create notes with 3 or more photos in my diary journal and you are a Paparazzi.

üîî Reminder - We will send you a gentle and friendly reminder to stay consistent with writing journal in my dairy journal app.

üìå Other options - Motivational, inspirational, and life-changing Quillio quotes in more than 30 languages.

Whether you want to call this app a mood diary or my diary, journal with lock or simply journal app you will not be wrong.

Follow us on Instagram:
https://instagram.com/quilliodiaryapp/

title: Feelings Diary
description:
Feelings Diary allows you to follow all the feelings and emotions you felt throughout the day and thus keep all the insights and circumstances in your special diary!

You can add related people and places, describe in detail what exactly happened, how exactly did you feel, and what thoughts were behind and accompanied the feeling! A great app for reflection!

It gives a material of enormous value for working with your therapist or self-analysis(still recommended to consult with a specialist)

Motivates you to write down your feelings and keep an eye on their changes in real-time!
Very convenient app!

Even got that dark theme;)

Would be happy to see your comment!

If you have any suggestions - please contact us via Telegram - there is a a link to our private community chat in "Settings"

title: Moodflow: Mood Tracker
description: Mood Tracker ‚úÖ Year in Pixels ‚úÖ Diary ‚úÖ Mood Calendar ‚úÖ Symptom Tracker ‚úÖ Habits ‚úÖ Gratitude Journal ‚úÖ Routines ‚úÖ Photo Album ‚úÖ Find all the tools you need for better mental health within Moodflow! Moodflow is a beautiful, modern and FREE app that captures your emotions, moods, thoughts, and general well-being. In addition, Moodflow goes along with you throughout your life, and gives you a deeper understanding of yourself, not previously known to you. Ultimately, this will allow you to improve your mental health and help you become a better you. ü§ó HOW DOES MOODFLOW WORK? You do not even need to write anything down to get a meaningful insight or to keep a diary. This is how easy Moodflow works: Fill out a quick survey every day and gain insight into the WHAT and HOW it influences you over time. ‚Ä¢ 1. Pick a rating for the day from 1 to 5. ‚Ä¢ 2. Pick the emotions you experienced. ‚Ä¢ 3. (optional) Write a note about everything important from the day. ‚Ä¢ 4. (optional) Pick the activities you did during the day. ‚Ä¢ 5. DONE! üòÅ üëÄWHAT WILL THIS DATA DO FOR ME? As time goes by, these short entries will gather insightful data about yourself that you will be able to analyze in many ways. On the one hand, a Calendar will be filled with colors that reflect your emotional well-being. This will allow you to get an eagle-eye perspective on your life that you never had before. On the other hand, Moodflow comes with data-analyzing tools, that will help you find relationships between a plethora of different factors and your mood. Moodflow will help you understand yourself better by allowing you to identify the things that bring you up ‚Üë or those that pull you down ‚Üì. üëèWHAT ELSE CAN MOODFLOW OFFER? Additionally, Moodflow encourages you to develop better habits by including 28-day challenges. These challenges have different levels of difficulty and will ensure that you create simple but powerful habits. As some have claimed: "We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence is therefore not an act, but a habit". More Features? We have them! ‚òÖ Multiple entries per day: Our mood fluctuates throughout the day. Therefore, you should be able to make as many entries as you want. ‚òÖ No annoying ads: Support the app by watching an advertisement. But only if you want to. ‚òÖ Gratitude Journal: Write something you are grateful for every day and benefit from the power of gratitude. ‚òÖ Routines: Use Moodflows in-built Routine planner to create your perfect routine and keep track of it. Step by step! ‚òÖ Statistics & Insight: Find relationships between multiple factors and your well-being with the multitude of charts offered. ‚òÖ Journal mode: Read all your entries at once as you would in a conventional journal. ‚òÖ Customize everything: Moodflow is a very personal app, this is why we give you the freedom of personalizing almost anything! ‚òÖ Color editor: Create your own color palettes from scratch. Millions of possibilities! ‚òÖ Background: Make Moodflow your personal app by even personalizing the background video or image. ‚òÖ And a lot more! üëá Download Moodflow NOW! It is FREE and always will be. Terms of Service: https://www.moodflow.co/tos.html Privacy Policy: https://www.moodflow.co/pp.html Support: https://www.moodflow.co/support.html
descriptionHTML:
Mood Tracker ‚úÖ
Year in Pixels ‚úÖ
Diary ‚úÖ
Mood Calendar ‚úÖ
Symptom Tracker ‚úÖ
Habits ‚úÖ
Gratitude Journal ‚úÖ
Routines ‚úÖ
Photo Album ‚úÖ
Find all the tools you need for better mental health within Moodflow!

Moodflow is a beautiful, modern and FREE app that captures your emotions, moods, thoughts, and general well-being. In addition, Moodflow goes along with you throughout your life, and gives you a deeper understanding of yourself, not previously known to you. Ultimately, this will allow you to improve your mental health and help you become a better you.

ü§ó HOW DOES MOODFLOW WORK?
You do not even need to write anything down to get a meaningful insight or to keep a diary.

This is how easy Moodflow works:
Fill out a quick survey every day and gain insight into the WHAT and HOW it influences you over time.

‚Ä¢ 1. Pick a rating for the day from 1 to 5.
‚Ä¢ 2. Pick the emotions you experienced.
‚Ä¢ 3. (optional) Write a note about everything important from the day.
‚Ä¢ 4. (optional) Pick the activities you did during the day.
‚Ä¢ 5. DONE! üòÅ

üëÄWHAT WILL THIS DATA DO FOR ME?
As time goes by, these short entries will gather insightful data about yourself that you will be able to analyze in many ways. On the one hand, a Calendar will be filled with colors that reflect your emotional well-being. This will allow you to get an eagle-eye perspective on your life that you never had before. On the other hand, Moodflow comes with data-analyzing tools, that will help you find relationships between a plethora of different factors and your mood. Moodflow will help you understand yourself better by allowing you to identify the things that bring you up ‚Üë or those that pull you down ‚Üì.

üëèWHAT ELSE CAN MOODFLOW OFFER?
Additionally, Moodflow encourages you to develop better habits by including 28-day challenges. These challenges have different levels of difficulty and will ensure that you create simple but powerful habits. As some have claimed: "We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence is therefore not an act, but a habit".

More Features? We have them!

‚òÖ Multiple entries per day: Our mood fluctuates throughout the day. Therefore, you should be able to make as many entries as you want.

‚òÖ No annoying ads: Support the app by watching an advertisement. But only if you want to.

‚òÖ Gratitude Journal: Write something you are grateful for every day and benefit from the power of gratitude.

‚òÖ Routines: Use Moodflows in-built Routine planner to create your perfect routine and keep track of it. Step by step!

‚òÖ Statistics & Insight: Find relationships between multiple factors and your well-being with the multitude of charts offered.

‚òÖ Journal mode: Read all your entries at once as you would in a conventional journal.

‚òÖ Customize everything: Moodflow is a very personal app, this is why we give you the freedom of personalizing almost anything!

‚òÖ Color editor: Create your own color palettes from scratch. Millions of possibilities!

‚òÖ Background: Make Moodflow your personal app by even personalizing the background video or image.

‚òÖ And a lot more!

üëá
Download Moodflow NOW!
It is FREE and always will be.


Terms of Service:
https://www.moodflow.co/tos.html

Privacy Policy:
https://www.moodflow.co/pp.html

Support:
https://www.moodflow.co/support.html

title: Gratitude: Self-Care Journal
description:
The Gratitude app is a carefully-designed self-care tool to help you focus on your mental health.

With gratitude journal, affirmations, vision board, and daily motivation content, Gratitude provides you with all the tools and reminders you need to gain motivation and develop a healthy self-love routine in your life.

To live a happy and fulfilling life, it is important for us to have good mental health and a strong sense of self-love.

And, as the app is completely private, you can always be assured that your precious journal entries, affirmations, and vision board are for your eyes only.

Here are the tools that you will find in the Gratitude app:

1. üìñ GRATITUDE JOURNAL

A gratitude journal or diary opens up your eyes to reflect on all the little blessings in your life. 

In daily life, we can lose sight of what we are fortunate to have and by keeping a journal you can slowly and steadily shift your perspective to focus on what is good in your life. 

The Gratitude app will send you reminders with prompts to help you build the habit of journaling. 

You can also add photos to your journal entries, build a gratitude journal streak, and access hundreds of journal prompts.

2. üíóPOSITIVE AFFIRMATIONS

If you‚Äôve heard about manifestation or the law of attraction, you‚Äôve probably heard about affirmations. 

Positive daily affirmations change our self-talk to focus on more loving and kind thoughts towards ourselves. 

They give us the motivation we need to keep moving forward and believe in ourselves.

The Gratitude app has hundreds of affirmations that you can listen to or read, as per your need. 

You can also write your own affirmations, add music, and record your voice to them.

Positive affirmations are a dearly loved tool and with this affirmations app, it is very easy for you to practice them.

3. üèûCREATE VISION BOARDS

Another super popular manifestation tool is a vision board, also called dream board. The vision board serves as a collage of your dreams and goals in the form of photos, quotes, and affirmations.

In the Gratitude app, we‚Äôll help you make a great vision board using sections, goal ideas, and create a video of all your goals together with music. You can also make multiple vision boards!

4. üåàDAILY ZEN

We understand the need for motivation and inspiration as you build a healthy routine with these self-help tools, which is why Daily Zen is an important part of the app. 

Here, you will find gratitude quotes, motivation quotes, thought switch ideas, thank you cards, affirmations, blog articles, and real-life stories of people who changed their mindset with gratitude.

One simple switch can begin a massive change in your life. A self-care tool like Gratitude will help you build a healthy routine to take care of your mental health, achieve your goals, and live a beautiful life.

title: Tracking Happiness
description:
The Tracking Happiness app is based on years of research and feedback from thousands of happiness trackers around the world! We conduct our own research (some of which has been published by Forbes!) and also study data from renowned sources such as the World Happiness Report. We bring it all together in this simple to use app to help you:

Track you happiness: you can journal and track your happiness every day, even multiple times per day by creating ‚Äúmoments‚Äù, setting expectations and reflecting upon how your day went

Learn:
the app will provide insights and stats on the input you provide, so the more you use it the more insights you can expect to obtain!
our content section will have recommended articles and posts for you, including actionable tips, examples and stories that will inspire you in your journey towards happiness
the community feature allows you to connect and interact, ask questions, post your tips, and much more with other happiness trackers

Take control: ultimately, we know that people who believe happiness is within their control are happier than those who don‚Äôt. So use the insights, understand what factors influence happiness the most in your life, learn from others and take control to improve your quality of life!

title: Happify
description:
Happify‚Äôs science-based activities and games can help reduce stress, overcome negative thoughts, and build greater resilience by providing effective tools and programs to improve emotional well-being.
 
Our techniques are developed by leading scientists and experts who've been studying evidence-based interventions in the fields of positive psychology, mindfulness and cognitive behavioral therapy for decades.

86% of people who use Happify regularly report feeling better about their lives in 2 months!

HAPPINESS ISN‚ÄôT JUST ONE THING. IT‚ÄôS EVERYTHING.

Struggling with everyday challenges and being gripped by negativity can be toxic to one's emotional and physical well-being, relationships, and performance at work. So when you start to turn the corner, and begin to learn the new habits of successful engagement with life, everything starts to look brighter and better.

SKEPTICAL JOURNALISTS TRIED IT FOR THEMSELVES, AND HERE‚ÄôS WHAT THEY SAID:

ABC World News' Mara Schiavocampo
"I gave it a shot for 5 weeks...it works!"

The New York Times
"Each track contains bite-size quizzes, games and activities that guide you to seeing more positive aspects of daily life."

The TODAY Show
"These are things you can do every day -- tasks you can complete and be rewarded for -- to feel better, reduce stress, live a better life, & actually be happy."

Katie Couric: World 3.0 on Yahoo
‚Äú[Happify] evaluates what's keeping you from a high happiness quotient, then you're given games and activities that will boost your mood, like Uplift, Serenity Scene, and Gratitude Walk."

YOU KNOW YOUR GOALS. WE KNOW HOW YOU CAN ACHIEVE THEM.

Choose one track. Choose them all.

* Conquering negative thoughts
* Coping better with stress
* Building self-confidence
* Fueling your career success
* Achieving mindfulness through meditation
* ‚Ä¶and 30+ more!

Happify is free to download and use. It‚Äôs a great way to get started, and discover why so many people upgrade to Happify Plus for access to even more:

* Unlimited access to 30+ tracks;
* Your 20-page character strength report, offered in partnership with the renowned VIA Institute
* Track your progress everyday and see how your skills compare
* and more!

Because we know that everyone has different financial resources, we offer Happify Plus in a variety of plans, for as low as $11.67/month.

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off (by going to Account Settings) at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. You cannot cancel the current subscription during the active subscription period.

Privacy Policy: http://www.happify.com/privacy
Terms & Conditions: http://www.happify.com/terms

Website: http://www.happify.com
Help: support@happify.com

title: Action for Happiness: Find tip
description:
Transform your happiness and mental health and create a kinder, happier world while doing it with the Action for Happiness app. You‚Äôll receive simple, daily reminders designed to inspire you to support your own mental health and wellbeing and spread more kindness to others around you too.

Join a community of positive change, wellness, kindness and self care that encourages you to create more happiness for yourself and others. Each month‚Äôs actions follow a specific theme, all based on the latest scientific research about happiness. Taking care of your mental health and investing in your own wellness has never been more important so we want to make it accessible to everyone. Whether you need help coping or simply want a little extra motivation, our self care tips and daily wellness ideas will help you on your journey to happier living.

Find happiness with our daily wellbeing ideas and reminders created to inspire you and give you heaps of motivation. From self care advice and tips to monthly wellness challenges, our app will help you transform and work towards happier living.

Investing in your own happiness, wellbeing and mental health couldn‚Äôt be easier with our expert self care tips and advice - here‚Äôs why you‚Äôll love to use Action for Happiness:

- Daily nudges to help you feel good - get simple action ideas to help create positive change and inspiration to support your happiness and wellbeing each day.
- Get happy and discover an exciting calendar every month - Friendly February, Mindful March, Active April, Joyful June, Self-Care September, Optimistic October and much more. Get reminders to ensure you keep the kindness and happiness going the whole year long.
- Find motivation with our community of kindness -  Share your own actions and ideas with others directly in the community, inspire others and become part of bigger and even more wonderful transformation
- Easy to use - Simply log in to access our tips and advice and start your happiness journey today.

Transform your own happiness and even help have a positive change on others who need support coping. 

Our daily reminders will inspire you to be happier and healthier - from wellness calendars to self care advice, we‚Äôre here to help you find happiness and work towards long term happier living.

Find happiness in the little things and help make the world a happier place. Find out more and join hundreds of thousands of others in the Action for Happiness movement at: www.actionforhappiness.org and get happy! 

Want more happiness in your life? We‚Äôre here to help you with your transformation - get happy with our daily reminders, self care tips and motivation for a happier way of living. Download the Action for Happiness app today.

Together we can transform, find happiness and create a positive change in the world..

---

Read our privacy policy here: www.actionforhappiness.org/privacy

title: Daylio Journal - Mood Tracker
description: Daylio enables you to keep a private journal without having to type a single line. Try this beautifully designed & stunningly simple micro-diary app right now for FREE! üòÅ WHAT IS DAYLIO Daylio is a very versatile app, and you can turn it in whatever you need to track. Your fitness goal pal. Your mental health coach. Your gratitude diary. Mood tracker. Your photo food log. Exercise, meditate, eat, and be grateful. Take care of your mental, emotional, and physical health. Good self-care is a key to improved mood and reduced anxiety. This is the time for your well-being, self-improvement, and self-care. Use Daylio as your daily bullet journal or goal tracker. We build it on three principles: ‚úÖ Reach happiness and self-improvement by being mindful of your days. ‚úÖ Validate your hunches. How does your new hobby influence your life? ‚úÖ Form a new habit in an obstacle-free environment ‚Äì no learning curve. Daylio is super simple to use ‚Äì create your first entry in two steps. For anxiety and stress relief, make sure to include activities that help you to cope with negativity. Everybody can use a mood boost! You can measure their impact on your mood in stats. ü§î HOW DOES IT WORK Pick your mood and add activities you have been doing during the day. You can also add notes and keep a more traditional diary with photos. Daylio is collecting recorded moods and activities in the statistics and calendar. This format will help you to understand your habits better. Keep track of your activities and create patterns to become more productive! You can review all entries in the charts or the calendar and share them with your friends. To make it even better, Daylio allows you: ‚≠ê Make reflection a daily habit ‚≠ê Discover what makes you happy ‚≠ê Use a big database of beautiful icons for your personalized activities ‚≠ê Relive your memories via a photo diary ‚≠ê Mix and match your own moods using funny emojis ‚≠ê Explore exciting statistics about your life on weekly, monthly, or yearly charts ‚≠ê Deep dive into advanced statistics for every mood, activity, or group ‚≠ê Customize color themes ‚≠ê Enjoy nights with dark mode ‚≠ê See your whole year in 'Year in Pixels' ‚≠ê Create daily, weekly or monthly goals and motivate yourself ‚≠ê Build habits and collect achievements ‚≠ê Share statistics with your friends ‚≠ê Safely back up and restore your entries via your private Google Drive ‚≠ê Set reminders and never forget to create a memory ‚≠ê Turn on the PIN lock and keep your diary safe ‚≠ê Export PDF and CSV documents to share or print your entries üßê PRIVACY AND SECURITY Daylio is by principle a private journal since we do not store or collect your data. At Daylio, we believe in transparency and honesty. Your data is stored locally on your phone. You can optionally schedule backups to your private cloud storage or take your backup file with you anywhere. Data are entirely under your control at all times. Data stored in the app's private directories are not accessible by any other apps or processes. Your backups are transferred to Google Drive via the secure (encrypted) channels. We don't send your data to our servers. We don't have access to your entries. Also, any other third-party app can't read your data.
descriptionHTML:
Daylio enables you to keep a private journal without having to type a single line. Try this beautifully designed & stunningly simple micro-diary app right now for FREE!


üòÅ WHAT IS DAYLIO

Daylio is a very versatile app, and you can turn it in whatever you need to track. Your fitness goal pal. Your mental health coach. Your gratitude diary. Mood tracker. Your photo food log. Exercise, meditate, eat, and be grateful. Take care of your mental, emotional, and physical health. Good self-care is a key to improved mood and reduced anxiety.

This is the time for your well-being, self-improvement, and self-care. Use Daylio as your daily bullet journal or goal tracker. We build it on three principles:

‚úÖ Reach happiness and self-improvement by being mindful of your days.
‚úÖ Validate your hunches. How does your new hobby influence your life?
‚úÖ Form a new habit in an obstacle-free environment ‚Äì no learning curve. Daylio is super simple to use ‚Äì create your first entry in two steps.

For anxiety and stress relief, make sure to include activities that help you to cope with negativity. Everybody can use a mood boost! You can measure their impact on your mood in stats.


ü§î HOW DOES IT WORK

Pick your mood and add activities you have been doing during the day. You can also add notes and keep a more traditional diary with photos. Daylio is collecting recorded moods and activities in the statistics and calendar. This format will help you to understand your habits better. Keep track of your activities and create patterns to become more productive!

You can review all entries in the charts or the calendar and share them with your friends.

To make it even better, Daylio allows you:
‚≠ê Make reflection a daily habit
‚≠ê Discover what makes you happy
‚≠ê Use a big database of beautiful icons for your personalized activities
‚≠ê Relive your memories via a photo diary
‚≠ê Mix and match your own moods using funny emojis
‚≠ê Explore exciting statistics about your life on weekly, monthly, or yearly charts
‚≠ê Deep dive into advanced statistics for every mood, activity, or group
‚≠ê Customize color themes
‚≠ê Enjoy nights with dark mode
‚≠ê See your whole year in 'Year in Pixels'
‚≠ê Create daily, weekly or monthly goals and motivate yourself
‚≠ê Build habits and collect achievements
‚≠ê Share statistics with your friends
‚≠ê Safely back up and restore your entries via your private Google Drive
‚≠ê Set reminders and never forget to create a memory
‚≠ê Turn on the PIN lock and keep your diary safe
‚≠ê Export PDF and CSV documents to share or print your entries


üßê PRIVACY AND SECURITY

Daylio is by principle a private journal since we do not store or collect your data.

At Daylio, we believe in transparency and honesty. Your data is stored locally on your phone. You can optionally schedule backups to your private cloud storage or take your backup file with you anywhere. Data are entirely under your control at all times.

Data stored in the app's private directories are not accessible by any other apps or processes. Your backups are transferred to Google Drive via the secure (encrypted) channels.

We don't send your data to our servers. We don't have access to your entries. Also, any other third-party app can't read your data.

title: The Art of Happiness
description:
Here are three of the ways recommended by the Dalai Lama for cultivating happiness: Train Your Mind For Happiness. Shift Your Perspective. Cultivate Compassion and Altruism.

This book will help you become happier! This book will forever be one of my favorites. The Dalai Lama's wisdom is clear, simple, and practical. He addresses many issues that we all face in daily life.

title: Free Happiness
description:
Free happiness will help you become a happier person based on research in positive psychology.

Feature customizable reminders to:
- Rate your current level of happiness
- Record what you are grateful for
- Take daily notes
- and to Smile!

** NOW Featuring cloud storage! Save all your data in the cloud and export it via email. Login with Facebook or create an account in the app! 

-------

How app is based on research:

- Keeping a gratitude journal is a great way to ensure that you realize how wonderful your life really is. Studies have shown that gratitude journals increase your happiness. 
*Here's a reference from the fine folks at Harvard:  http://www.health.harvard.edu/healthbeat/giving-thanks-can-make-you-happier

- Smiling more will make you happy! Even if it's forced at first, you'll soon  be realizing that it will come more natural and be easier to do. 
*Reference: https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2012/07/120730150113.htm

- Rating your current level of happiness could make you more mindful of it which has the potential to make you happier since it's on your mind. This feature is also very useful for helping you track progress. More research is needed in this area to determine long term benefits.

-------

Some reminder features:

- Allow for randomness. You don't want to always smile at 3pm, let's try to mix it up a bit.
- Specify time ranges. No point getting a reminder to rate your happiness if you are already asleep.
- Specify exact times so you can write your grateful things on your schedule. Try in the morning.

-------

*** This app is completely free without any in-app purchases or advertisements! ***

*** Enjoy your Free Happiness!!! ***

*** Please review the app and let me know what I can do to earn 5 stars! Email: info@wowsery.com

-------

Permission Details:
- Photos/Media/Files and Storage: Only to store 'Smiling Selfie Photos'. No other photos are accessed in any way.
- Wi-Fi connection information/view network connections/full network access: In order to detect internet connection for account syncing.
- Run at startup: In order to sync account and start scheduling reminders.

title: Happier
description:
Want to become happier, healthier, more productive, and more creative? The Happier‚Ñ¢ app is a revolutionary habit-tracking tool that offers a range of personalized, practical strategies to help you achieve your goals and put happiness within reach. Research suggests that we repeat about 40% of our behavior almost daily, so if we change our habits, we can change our lives‚Äîstarting today.

WINNER OF A 2022 WEBBY AWARD for Best Visual Design (Function) in Apps and Software.

 

WHAT MAKES THE HAPPIER APP DIFFERENT:

Get personalized recommendations, not a one-size-fits-all solution‚Äîdifferent tools work for different people.

Experiment with a variety of habit-tracking tools and find what works for you.

Track any habits you choose, rather than be limited to a single, app-specific aim.

More than just a habit tracker‚Äîexplore a library of habit-formation tips and happiness-boosting insights to gain self-knowledge and discover new strategies.

Spin the Wheel for fun daily challenges to get a quick boost of happiness, energy, or creativity.

Based on the research of renowned happiness and habit-formation expert Gretchen Rubin.

 

HOW IT WORKS:

Join the millions of people who have taken Gretchen Rubin‚Äôs Four Tendencies quiz to find out whether you‚Äôre an Obliger, Questioner, Upholder, or Rebel. This groundbreaking personality framework helps the app recommend the most effective tools for you.

With step-by-step guidance, choose an area where you‚Äôd like to be happier, and identify the concrete steps to help you achieve your aim. Track any habit, such as getting regular exercise, reading, meditating, keeping a journal, monitoring consumption, managing clutter, making time for relationships, cultivating creativity, and more.

Get personalized habit-tracking tools recommended for you based on your Tendency, or choose any tool to track your progress. 

Schedule helpful reminders, track your progress, and continue to build more happiness habits. Even small steps make a big difference over time.

 

TRY THE HAPPIER APP FOR FREE

The Happier app is free to download. Track one aim without a subscription to find the habit-change tool that works for you. Subscribe to unlock unlimited aims and get the flexibility to track all the habits that make you happier, healthier, more productive, and more creative.

Subscribe for $7.99 monthly, or save $20 with a $75 annual subscription.

 

WANT TO LEARN MORE?

For resources and support: thehappierapp.com

Follow on social media: @thehappierapp on Twitter, @hereisthehappierapp on Instagram

title: WHOLE: Boost Your Happiness
description:
Whole, by The Happy Broadcast, is a self-care app designed to be your companion on a journey towards a happier life. The app includes daily mood-tracking, journaling, a social gratitude feed, breathing exercises, hydration reminders, sleep sounds, meditation and many more habits that you can customize to add to your home menu, allowing you to create a truly custom experience tailored to your everyday needs. The intuitive and beautifully designed app helps you develop simple daily habits that can help improve your overall mental health and wellness. 

What is Whole?

Whole helps improve your mental health and wellness by training your behavior in ways scientifically shown to improve mental wellbeing. Whole features daily mood tracking to allow you to understand your moods and the triggers that incite them, a gratitude journal so you can read (and share) moments of gratitude from the community, and a robust habit builder that allows you to select specialized training modules to help you form and strengthen habits that can impact your mental health.

All of Whole‚Äôs features come together in a personalized diary screen and the app includes a robust set of stats to provide you with insights on your mental health and the factors that contribute to it.

How does Whole work?

Whole is free to use, with some upgraded features available only to premium subscribers. While there is a subscription option, users can enjoy most of the app‚Äôs key features for free. Sign in using an email address and we will walk you through the key features of the app during a guided onboarding. 

Key features include:

- Track your mood and add a note so that you can keep a history of how you were feeling and what made you feel that way

- Share and like thoughts of gratitude with a social community in our vertical scrolling ‚Äúgratitude feed‚Äù

- Create a custom set of habits from our growing library of content to help build behaviors that positively contribute to your mental health and wellness. Habits cover a wide range of activities including: getting better sleep or hydration, controlling feelings of anger, alleviating feelings of anxiety, and much much more.

- Take a moment to relax and reduce stress with a guided breathing exercise or get your daily dose of illustrated positive news from The Happy Broadcast

- Track your progress with a robust stats section that lets you see what types of things are contributing to your mental wellbeing

- View your history of all activity in our home page diary, which serves as a personalized journal of your daily activity within the Whole app

- Set reminders of tasks to complete as part of your training towards achieving a happier mental state

- Customize your public feed with premium avatars and background colors

Who are the people behind Whole?

Whole was born from a community on Instagram known as The Happy Broadcast (@the_happy_broadcast). Since 2018, The Happy Broadcast has delivered positive news to a growing community of over 1 million people across the globe. The focus on positive news, delivered in an aesthetically pleasing format, has served to delight millions of people and spawned a movement to de-stigmatize issues of anxiety, depression and mental health. Over the years, research has confirmed the power of positivity, and Whole aims to help harness that power by becoming a personal trainer for your mental health, leveraging information, techniques, and activities that build a better and stronger mental state for users.

Privacy

Any information you enter within Whole is private to you unless you choose to share it with the community in our social gratitude feed. For more, check out our full Privacy Policy and Terms of Use at getwhole.co.

title: The Happiness Project: Play Ga
description: Play short games to help brain scientists study the psychology and neuroscience of well-being! Created by scientists at UCL and Yale, this app is a citizen science project taking psychology and neuroscience experiments from the lab to your smartphone. Every 3-minute game that you finish contributes data to real scientific research about how the brain works. The anonymous surveys help us see what causes well-being and understand mental health conditions like anxiety and depression. Be part of a unique citizen science experiment and help us write the equation for happiness! Dr Robb Rutledge (Yale Psychology) says: "We all want to know what determines happiness. It‚Äôs hard to figure it out! In our games, we ask people about their happiness as they make decisions in different situations. We hope people enjoy our app and help us answer some really important scientific questions!" This citizen science project was supported by the UK Medical Research Council.
descriptionHTML:
Play short games to help brain scientists study the psychology and neuroscience of well-being!

Created by scientists at UCL and Yale, this app is a citizen science project taking psychology and neuroscience experiments from the lab to your smartphone.

Every 3-minute game that you finish contributes data to real scientific research about how the brain works. The anonymous surveys help us see what causes well-being and understand mental health conditions like anxiety and depression. Be part of a unique citizen science experiment and help us write the equation for happiness!

Dr Robb Rutledge (Yale Psychology) says: "We all want to know what determines happiness. It‚Äôs hard to figure it out! In our games, we ask people about their happiness as they make decisions in different situations. We hope people enjoy our app and help us answer some really important scientific questions!"

This citizen science project was supported by the UK Medical Research Council.

title: The Happiness Planner
description:
The Happiness Planner is a calendar and to-do list app to help you cultivate happiness by embracing the power of positive thinking, mindfulness, gratitude and self-development.

The practices in The Happiness Planner will help you adopt a positive outlook on life, build introspection into your routine, increase self-awareness, and feel more inspired and fulfilled from within.

In short, while using The Happiness Planner, you'll be encouraged to:

- Set goals that will maximize your happiness levels.
- Practice self-reflection so that you understand yourself better.
- Plan your life around things that truly matter with those who truly matter.
- Make changes to the things that make you unhappy.
- Set goals that you want to achieve and write down your action plans.
- Train your mind to always look at the positive side of things.
- Learn to master the art of resilience.
- Start each day with a positive and exciting thought.
- End each day with gratitude.
- Evaluate your health, happiness, energy, and productivity levels.
- Reflect on your month and the lessons learned. 
- Set goals for improvement.


FEATURES:

- Your Happiness Roadmap
- Monthly Goal Setting
- Monthly Reflection
- Daily Inspirational Quotes & Articles
- Daily Goal Setting
- Daily Schedule & To-Dos
- Daily Exercise and Meal Plans
- Daily Reflection and Positive Thinking
- Daily Gratitude
- Daily Notes
- Bucket List

Download now and start living a more inspired, positive, and happier life.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS

The Happiness Planner is a free to download and free to use app. For the first 30 days, you will have access to all features including premium features. After that, you will be limited to only Schedule & To-Do features. In order to continue having access to premium features, you have to upgrade to become a subscribed member. If you wish to cancel your membership or subscription, you need to do so more than 24 hours before your renewal date.

Your Happiness Planner subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and will be charged through your Google Play account. Refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

title: Ten Percent Happier - Meditati
description:
Want to sleep better, be more mindful, improve your relationships, and become just about ten percent happier? This is the app for you. Our guided meditations, videos, talks, and sleep content will help you build (or boost) your meditation practice, and stick with it.

WHAT‚ÄôS INSIDE:

- Video and meditation combos that make it fun and straightforward to learn to meditate.
- A library of 500+ guided meditations on topics ranging from anxiety to parenting to focus, ensuring that you can find exactly the right meditation for the moment.
- A sleep section filled with relaxing meditations that make it easy to fall (and stay) asleep.
- Bite-size stories, wisdom, and inspiration that you can listen to while on the go - for those moments when you‚Äôre not feeling like meditation but want some mindfulness.
- New content released weekly to keep meditation from becoming a chore.
- Quick meditations that fit into your busy life‚Äîduring your commute, lunch break, etc.

PRESS: 

** #1 Top listed app in New York Times ‚ÄòHow to Meditate‚Äô guide

** Featured for ‚Äòemergency election stress‚Äô meditations in The Washington Post

** Launched on ABC‚Äôs Good Morning America


--------------

About the 10% Happier book:

In his #1 New York Times bestseller, 10% Happier, ABC news anchor Dan Harris explores how his on-air panic attack in 2004 prompted him to search for a way to defang the voice in his head. He found meditation, and it's helped him be less yanked around by his emotions.

--------------

About the 10% Happier podcast:

In his top-ranking podcast, Dan talks with smart people about whether there's anything beyond 10%. Can you be an ambitious person and still strive for enlightenment (whatever that means)? 

--------------

If you‚Äôre enjoying the app, please leave a review. It really helps! 

Questions/technical support? Please email us at support@tenpercent.com.

About the 10% Happier podcast:

In his top-ranking podcast, Dan talks with smart people about whether there's anything beyond 10%. Can you be an ambitious person and still strive for enlightenment (whatever that means)?

--------------

If you‚Äôre enjoying the app, please leave a review. It really helps!

Questions/technical support? Please email us at support@tenpercent.com.

title: 28 Secrets to Happiness
description:
‚ÄúHow can I be happier?‚Äù This is a question many people may ask themselves at some point of their lives. Being a happier person actually is not as difficult as one would imagine. You do not need to be a millionaire, have the perfect spouse or own luxurious goods to be happy. 

In ‚Äú28 secrets to Happiness‚Äù, it provides 28 practical and effective tips to significantly boost your level of happiness. Each article provides concrete examples, tips and reflection questions to help you to become a better version of yourself. 

Happiness can be learnt! 
Follow this instruction: Read 1-3 articles a day, ponder on the questions and implement what it teaches you. 
In less than one-month‚Äôs time, you will have learnt the secret to becoming a happier person.  

Download ‚Äú28 secrets to Happiness‚Äù today!

title: Happiness 360¬∞
description:
Happiness 360¬∞ is an immersive community exploration of proven habits for increasing happiness from positive psychology researcher Shawn Achor's best-selling book ‚ÄúThe Happiness Advantage. ‚Äú

Educators and organizational leaders are provided a series of 21-Day Challenges that bring happiness to the forefront for students, employees, and families to provide the greatest competitive advantage to us all‚Ä¶ a positive engaged brain.

In "An Introduction to the Orange Frog" you will meet Spark and his friends and learn the story of how being ‚Äúorange,‚Äù or positive, can ripple to others and create a happier, more successful community focused on our mutual wellbeing.

Join a growing community of leaders increasing optimism, engagement and resilience in their schools and organizations.  Use public groups to share your own experiences, happy photos, gratitudes and lessons-learned to support our collective journey to becoming more orange!

Enjoy this platform and its resources‚Ä¶ and bring the happiness advantage to life for yourself and others.

title: Happiness Quest
description: Play short games to help brain scientists study the psychology and neuroscience of well-being! Created by scientists at UCL and Yale, this app is a citizen science project taking psychology and neuroscience experiments from the lab to your smartphone. Every 3-minute game that you finish contributes data to real scientific research about how the brain works. The anonymous surveys help us see what causes well-being and understand mental health conditions like anxiety and depression. Be part of a unique citizen science experiment and help us write the equation for happiness! Dr Robb Rutledge (Yale Psychology) says: "We all want to know what determines happiness. It‚Äôs hard to figure it out! In our games, we ask people about their happiness as they make decisions in different situations. We hope people enjoy our app and help us answer some really important scientific questions!" This citizen science project was supported by the UK Medical Research Council.
descriptionHTML:
Play short games to help brain scientists study the psychology and neuroscience of well-being!

Created by scientists at UCL and Yale, this app is a citizen science project taking psychology and neuroscience experiments from the lab to your smartphone.

The anonymous surveys help us see what causes well-being and understand mental health conditions like anxiety and depression. Dr Robb Rutledge (Yale Psychology) says: "We all want to know what determines happiness. It‚Äôs hard to figure it out! In our games, we ask people about their happiness as they make decisions in different situations. We hope people enjoy our app and help us answer some really important scientific questions!"

This citizen science project was supported by the UK Medical Research Council.

title: Gratitude: Self-Care Journal
description:
The Gratitude app is a carefully-designed self-care tool to help you focus on your mental health.

With gratitude journal, affirmations, vision board, and daily motivation content, Gratitude provides you with all the tools and reminders you need to gain motivation and develop a healthy self-love routine in your life.

To live a happy and fulfilling life, it is important for us to have good mental health and a strong sense of self-love.

And, as the app is completely private, you can always be assured that your precious journal entries, affirmations, and vision board are for your eyes only.

Here are the tools that you will find in the Gratitude app:

1. üìñ GRATITUDE JOURNAL

A gratitude journal or diary opens up your eyes to reflect on all the little blessings in your life. 

In daily life, we can lose sight of what we are fortunate to have and by keeping a journal you can slowly and steadily shift your perspective to focus on what is good in your life. 

The Gratitude app will send you reminders with prompts to help you build the habit of journaling. 

You can also add photos to your journal entries, build a gratitude journal streak, and access hundreds of journal prompts.

2. üíóPOSITIVE AFFIRMATIONS

If you‚Äôve heard about manifestation or the law of attraction, you‚Äôve probably heard about affirmations. 

Positive daily affirmations change our self-talk to focus on more loving and kind thoughts towards ourselves. 

They give us the motivation we need to keep moving forward and believe in ourselves.

The Gratitude app has hundreds of affirmations that you can listen to or read, as per your need. 

You can also write your own affirmations, add music, and record your voice to them.

Positive affirmations are a dearly loved tool and with this affirmations app, it is very easy for you to practice them.

3. üèûCREATE VISION BOARDS

Another super popular manifestation tool is a vision board, also called dream board. The vision board serves as a collage of your dreams and goals in the form of photos, quotes, and affirmations.

In the Gratitude app, we‚Äôll help you make a great vision board using sections, goal ideas, and create a video of all your goals together with music. You can also make multiple vision boards!

4. üåàDAILY ZEN

We understand the need for motivation and inspiration as you build a healthy routine with these self-help tools, which is why Daily Zen is an important part of the app. 

Here, you will find gratitude quotes, motivation quotes, thought switch ideas, thank you cards, affirmations, blog articles, and real-life stories of people who changed their mindset with gratitude.

One simple switch can begin a massive change in your life. A self-care tool like Gratitude will help you build a healthy routine to take care of your mental health, achieve your goals, and live a beautiful life.

title: Happy Not Perfect: Meditation
description:
When our minds are clear and collected we feel better, sleep better and make better decisions. Let‚Äôs start looking after your mind daily so you can feel your best, and it only takes a few minutes!
 
It‚Äôs easy to get weighed down by life‚Äôs challenges and that‚Äôs why we teamed up with experts and scientists to come up with simple exercises to boost your mental well-being.
 
Feeling good is an inside job that requires practice. Jump into the Daily Refresh, a quick 7-step routine to help you boost your feel-good hormones and relax your nervous system anywhere, at any time.
 
Backed by science, designed for you, Happy Not Perfect is your go-to-place for everything you need to look after your mind in a fun new way.
 
- Play the Daily Refresh to stay balanced, stress less and sleep better 
- Select your mood and complete a full mind interactive workout
- Learn to breathe right and calm your nervous system instantly
- Release worries and let go of negative thoughts 
- Practice a positive mindset and boost your mood 
- Meditate in a fun way with our guided, easy-listening sessions
- Listen to a "Daily Dose" of wisdom and positivity to make any day better
- Unlock 300+ mindful exercises
 
Stressed, anxious, tired, angry, frustrated, heartbroken, sad or anything in-between. We have a tool for you to help you on your way to feeling better.

Some content is available only through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase.

title: Who is happy - We share happin
description:
Who is Happy is a geolocated social network connecting cannabis
consumers ‚Äãthrough a chat platform ‚Äãto exchange information and experiences with other users around the world through a chat, share feelings, find useful information about consumption and locate cannabis business establishments around the world.

Who is Happy is a geolocated social network connecting cannabis consumers ‚Äãthrough a chat platform‚Äã to exchange information, share feelings, find useful information about consumption and locate cannabis business establishments around the world.
Through the app it's possible to share your location privately and display different stickers based on your feeling when consuming cannabis. Also, it's possible to find other happy users by visualizing their profiles over a map, locate cannabis business establishments and if you like stats, you can also get information about your consumption, ‚Äãmonitor happiness statistics at country-level‚Äã as well as check the ranking of most happy countries!


Features
- Exchange information and experiences with other cannabis consumers around the world through a chat.
- Locate cannabis business establishments near you.
- Check in on Who is Happy to share your consume of cannabis through a green smoke in the map.
- Share your feelings about cannabis displaying stickers on the map.
- Check data about cannabis consumption around the world.
- Track your consumption of cannabis.

title: The Happiness Planner
description:
The Happiness Planner is a calendar and to-do list app to help you cultivate happiness by embracing the power of positive thinking, mindfulness, gratitude and self-development.

The practices in The Happiness Planner will help you adopt a positive outlook on life, build introspection into your routine, increase self-awareness, and feel more inspired and fulfilled from within.

In short, while using The Happiness Planner, you'll be encouraged to:

- Set goals that will maximize your happiness levels.
- Practice self-reflection so that you understand yourself better.
- Plan your life around things that truly matter with those who truly matter.
- Make changes to the things that make you unhappy.
- Set goals that you want to achieve and write down your action plans.
- Train your mind to always look at the positive side of things.
- Learn to master the art of resilience.
- Start each day with a positive and exciting thought.
- End each day with gratitude.
- Evaluate your health, happiness, energy, and productivity levels.
- Reflect on your month and the lessons learned. 
- Set goals for improvement.


FEATURES:

- Your Happiness Roadmap
- Monthly Goal Setting
- Monthly Reflection
- Daily Inspirational Quotes & Articles
- Daily Goal Setting
- Daily Schedule & To-Dos
- Daily Exercise and Meal Plans
- Daily Reflection and Positive Thinking
- Daily Gratitude
- Daily Notes
- Bucket List

Download now and start living a more inspired, positive, and happier life.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS

The Happiness Planner is a free to download and free to use app. For the first 30 days, you will have access to all features including premium features. After that, you will be limited to only Schedule & To-Do features. In order to continue having access to premium features, you have to upgrade to become a subscribed member. If you wish to cancel your membership or subscription, you need to do so more than 24 hours before your renewal date.

Your Happiness Planner subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and will be charged through your Google Play account. Refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

title: Happyfeed: Gratitude Journal
description:
Happyfeed is a simple gratitude journal with photos designed to boost your mood by reflecting on 3 good things each day. Research shows that a gratitude journal can improve your happiness and help you feel 10% happier by focusing on the good things in life. Join a Pod to share your joy with a group of close friends!

‚Ä¢ Add photos or locations to your 3 good things
‚Ä¢ Daily throwbacks to grateful memories
‚Ä¢ Groups perfect for couples, friends, or family sharing
‚Ä¢ Custom daily prompts & reminders every day
‚Ä¢ Stay motivated with gratitude streaks and self-growth
‚Ä¢ Tag happier days with emojis
‚Ä¢ Lock your gratitude journal with a passcode

üî≠ Explore Your Happy Memories
After one week, we‚Äôll prompt you to hop back in time to memories in your gratitude journal from that day one week or, eventually, years ago. This period grows to months and even years. Take a second to reflect on your joy and get the big picture of your personal growth.

üåø Pods: Shared Journal
Pods are private groups for sharing memories, a photo a day, or daily journaling progress. React to shared moments by sending emojis. It's a unique way to be grateful and share positivity as a couple or with friends and family. If you're looking for a shared journal or diary, that's Pods! 

üëã Grateful Reminders Daily
Every morning receive a new daily prompt as a reminder to be grateful and write 3 good things for your self-growth. Quotes about happiness, a fun fact, or little jokes to prompt joy & positivity in your life.

‚ú® Happiness Jar
After a couple of weeks, view past diary moments using the Happiness Jar. Shake to see one random memory and feel happier in seconds instead of minutes of scrolling through a feed. Past happy moments may even prompt more gratitude!

üë©‚Äçüî¨ Benefits of Gratitude Journaling
Keeping a gratitude journal can help reduce stress and anxiety while boosting your mood and overall happiness. Studies have shown it can make you even 10% happier - take 5 minutes to write down 3 good things every day. Taking a second for grateful reflection can help you cultivate happier thoughts. Gratitude journals are the perfect practice for your personal growth!

üîê Private, Secure, & Locked
An account is required in order to keep your photo diary safe and available on any device. Syncing is securely encrypted using HTTPS endpoints. Cloud storage allows us to backup your moments and photos so you never lose your gratitude journal. Lock your diary with a passcode to keep your joy private.

üòÑ 3 Good Things
We designed Happyfeed as a simple gratitude journal and photo diary, to be grateful every day, and build a happy feed of pictures and moments from your life. Every feature is based on practices from positive psychology research - starting with 3 good things. Reflecting for just 5 minutes can make you 10% happier and track your personal growth & mood. Groups, photos, and the Happiness Jar help you spread joy and build a positive self-growth habit.
